fields.Description:
Product Description

  • VIBRANT SHAULA is a Nano fungicide containing fortified plant extracts and colloidal noble metals.

Technical Content

  • Protein hydrolysates 0.4%, Nano Chitosan 0.2%, Nano Silver 0.01%, Nano Copper 0.01%, Water 99.38%

Features & Benefits

FEATURES

  • Does not adversely affect honey bees and other Pollinators, predators and parasites
  • Assists in acquiring receptors of resistance against plant pathogens
  • Induces ambient factors that help by interfering with the reproduction capacity of several bacteria, yeast, fungi and virus in the case of common plants
  • Does not leave behind toxic residues and no withdrawal period is needed.
  • Works in all weather conditions
  • Compatible to most of the Chemical Pesticides
  • Environmentally safe
  • Does not produce any phytotoxicity.


BENEFITS

  • Pre-Sowing Soil disinfection,
  • Seed Treatment: Soaking Seeds before planting reduces mound growth in sprouts
  • Disinfection of Fungi, Bacteria and Virus on plants.
  • Post harvesting: Extending Shelf Life of the Produce, due to its disinfection property

Usage

CROPS

  • Agriculture Crops: Paddy, Wheat, Cotton, Maize, Red gram, Sugarcane, Tobacco
  • Horticulture Crops: Banana, Mango, Pomegranate, Coconut, Oil Palm, Grapes, Guava, Onion, Potato, Tomato, Chilli, Brinjal, Rose, Marigold etc.


MODE OF ACTION

  • Which works as catalyst and enhances the performance of any chemical fungicide when used together and gives longer waiting period. It reduces the required dosage of chemical fungicides.


Method Of Application

  • Foliar It can be used with any other commercially available fungicide The dosage of the fungicide may vary but the dosage of Vibrant SHAULA remains the same.


DOSAGE

  • Dosage: 2ml / L


Additional Information

  • Which works as catalyst and enhances the performance of any chemical fungicide when used together and gives longer waiting period. It reduces the required dosage of chemical fungicides.

Disclaimer

  • The product is proven with several success stories by farmers across the country.

  • Bighaat is not liable for any issues / concerns.

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • UMS ECTOBASSIANA is a safe and effective crop health promoting fungi found commonly in soil worldwide. The strain acts as a natural parasite towards various arthropods, including lepidoptera, hymenoptera, homoptera, and orthoptera.

Technical Content

  • Beauveria bassaina : 2X109 CFU
  • Verticillium Lecanii : 1X109 CFU
  • Metarhizium anisopliae : 1X109 CFU
  • Carrier: Dextrose Anhydrous

Features & Benefits

FEATURES

  • UMS ECTOBASSIANA is pathogenic to certain insects and can degrade the outer shell and invade the host's body.
  • It is also capable of producing toxins such as Bassiana and Oopsporin which also lead to the hosts death.


BENEFITS

  • It is naturally occurring, eco-friendly entomopathogenic fungus.
  • It effectively controls most of the economically important crop pests.
  • It helps to increase productivity by improving crop health through controlling the pests.
  • It can be used up until the day of harvest as the residues are not harmful to the consumer.

Usage

CROPS

  • All crops


INSECTS/ DISEASE

  • UMS ECTOBASSIANA is pathogenic to certain insects like Caterpillars, Weevils, Borers, Leafhoppers, Jassids, Whitefly, Aphids, Thrips, Mealybugs, fungus gnats, Mites and May beetles.

DOSAGE

  • For Foliar Spray:
  • Mix 5 grams of ECTOBASSIANA in 1 Ltr of water and spray thoroughly on all parts of the plants .
  • For Soil Drench & Drip:
  • Mix 1 kg of ECTOBASSIANAE with 100 to 200 liters of water and send it through a drip per 1 acre .
  • For Soil Application:
  • Use 1 kg of ECTOBASSIANA mix with 1 tonne of organic bio manure and apply in 1 acre .
  • DIRECTIONS & PRECAUTIONS:
  • Store at room temperature & Store away from Sunlight, Keep away from direct sunlight.
  • Use Early Morning or Evening Hours for better results.

fields.Description:
Product Description

ABOUT PRODUCT

  • Eco neem plus is a Neem based biopesticide with a blend of 10,000 ppm Azadirachtin and Neem oil, providing all the liminoids for an effective insecticidal action.
  • Econeem Plus has multiple modes of action Like, Repellent, Antifeedant, Insect growth retardant and inhibits egg laying and hatching. Product has systemic activity resulting in good translaminar action.

Technical Content

  • Azadiractin 10000 PPM

Usage

Crops and pest

  • Fruit borer in Tomato
  • Fruit & shoot borer in Brinjal

Recommended Dosage

  • 1000-1500 ml per hectare
  • Dilution ΓÇô 3 ml\litre of water
  • Apply as a prophylactic and\or at early stage of insect attack.
  • Ensure complete coverage of canopy
  • Repeat spray at 7-10 days of interval based on the pest load

fields.Description:
Product Description

EBS All Expert Is a New Unique Combination of 3 Bio Pesticides Verticillium Lecanii + Beauveria Bassiana + Metarhizium Anisopliae That Occur Naturally in Soils Throughout the World ΓÇô The Combination Gives Excellent Bio ΓÇô Insecticide Control

Technical Content

CFU: 2 X 10^8 per ml

Features & Benefits

Usage

CROPS

Field crops: Cotton, Paddy, Sorghum, Sunflower, Groundnut, Potato, Mustard etc.

Vegetable crops: Brinjal, Bhendi, Tomato, Chillies, etc

 

INSECTS/ DISEASE

Target Insect: Aphids, Jassids, white flies, Thrips, Aphids, Mites, leafhoppers, and mealybugs for various crops.

 

MODE OF ACTION

EBS All Expert is a bioinsecticide containing the white muscardine fungus Beauveria bassiana and the white halo fungus Verticillium lecanii in equal proportion. It can be used for the management of lepidopterous larvae, beetle grubs, grasshopper thrips, whiteflies, aphids, soft-bodied scale insects, and mealy bugs.

 

DOSAGE

Dose: Soil Application ΓÇô 1-1.5 liter per hectare; Foliar application ΓÇô 1-2 ml per liter of water

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • ABAMECTIN 1.9 % IN EMULSIFIABLE CONCENTRATE FORMULATION

 Technical Details

  • ABAMECTIN 1.9%

Features & Benefits

  • Abamectin 1.9% EC is a broad-spectrum insecticide and acaricide that's used to control a variety of insects, ticks, and mites.

Benefits

  • It is a broad-spectrum Miticide and Insecticide
  • It has strong translaminar activity with contact and stomach action, therefore giving the best control.
  • It is a product of natural origin, hence itΓÇÖs very safe for mammals.
  • Control phytophagous mites and insect pests on a variety of agricultural and horticultural crops.

Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: It is used for vegetable, soybean, maize, pea, green gram, cabbage, gram, leafy vegetable, tuber vegetable, fruits, cotton, cereals, pulses and all type of crops.

Mode of Action:

Abamectin 1.9% EC is a nerve poison that works by disrupting the nervous system of pests. It binds to chloride channels in the pests' nerve cells, which causes paralysis and death.

Dosage

  • 15-25 ml/pump.
  • 150-250 ml/ Acre.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.cardtitle: ALBATA ROYAL CLEAR MITE BIO INSECTICIDE (PLANT EXTRACT)
fields.Description:
Product Description

ABOUT PRODUCT

  • Royal Clear Mite is 100% Plant derived solution, Non-Hazardous and biodegradable solution, disrupts breathing of Spider mites, Prevents Spider mites laid eggs from hatching. Applicable on the leaves as a foliar spray, kills on contact or ingestion, fast acting. Royal Clear Mite (ALBATA) NOCA, SATTVIK and KRUSHI Certified, Non-Toxic, Eco friendly.

Technical Content

∩é╖  100% derived from plant extracts

Features & Benefits

FEATURES

  • Sustainable and Chemical free Agriculture product .
  • Non-Hazardous and biodegradable solution.
  • Prevents Spider mites laid eggs from hatching.

Usage

  • CROPS -

Target Pests:Smell Free Agricultural and Domestic use for Control of Spider Mites, Aphids, Red Spider Mites, Two-Spotted Mites, Thrips in plants, Mosquito Larva, Southern Red Mites, Spruce Mites, Slugs, Chiggers, European Red Mites, white flies, thunder flies, greenflies, blackflies.

Target Crops:Can be used on any plant that has a mite infestation. Cucurbits, Tomatoes, Grass/Lawns, Squash, Grapes. Pumpkins, trees. Roses, Cucumbers, Zucchini, Wheat, Peonies.

  • INSECTS/ DISEASES - Collar Rot, Damping Off, Root Rot, Wilts, Black Leg, Tip Burn, Black Spot
  • MODE OF ACTION -
  • Contact and systematic action.
  • One of the A.I passes Inter cellularly into the xylem vessels & it is swept along by the sap stream towards the shoot apex acropetally.
  • DOSAGE -
  • Dilute 2ml of Royal Clear Mite with 1 litre of water.
  • The dilution ratio depends on the frequency of application. 1:750 is ideal for 1-2 times use every month and 1:500 is best recommended for every 3 to 5 days use and heavy infestation.
  • ADDITIONAL INFORMATION-

DIRECTIONS FOR MIXING AND HANDLING ΓÇôINSTRUCTIONS

  • Mix the required amount of Royal Clear Mite in water with sufficient agitation to maintain a uniform suspension in the spray or mixing tank.
  • Tank should be cleaned prior to use. Do not use highly alkaline or highly acidic water to mix sprays. Use a buffering agent if necessary to maintain neutrality (pH 6 to 8) of water in the tank.
  • Maintain agitation during application. Apply immediately after mixing; do not allow spray mix to stand overnight. Always jar test before mixing products to avoid chemical incompatibility.

Note:This Sucking Pest Control should only be used on the recommended dose. Overdose is a violation of law, and it will not give you a better result. Apply immediately when the solution is mixed. Avoid the spray mixture to stand overnight.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Multiplex Safe Root controls most of the soil-borne nematodes and works as Bio Nematicide.
  • It mycelial mat, conidia spores of beneficial fungus in high concentration which is highly effective in controlling the Plant parasitic nematodes.

Multiplex Safe Root Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Trichoderma harzianum 1.0% WP (Min. 2 x 106 CFU /gm in Carrier Based)
  • Mode of Action: Safe Root produces substances that act on the eggs, adults & free-living stages of plant parasitic nematodes causing deformations and loss of movement. Multiplex Safe Root is able to penetrate the egg and grow inside the eggs and then it destroys the developing embryo.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Multiplex Safe Root effectively controls soil borne nematodes.
  • It helps in healthy root formation which will absorb plant nutrients & water as and when required by the plant.
  • This will lead to healthy plant growth which in turn will result in increased yield.

Multiplex Safe Root Usage & Crops

Recommended crops┬¡: All vegetables, Field crops, Fruits

Target pests: All kinds of plant parasitic nematodes mainly Root ┬¡knot nematodes, Cyst nematodes, Burrowing nematodes, Citrus nematodes, Potato cyst nematodes, Rice root nematodes, Stunt nematodes etc.

Method of Application & Dosage:

  • Seed Treatment: 20 gm per kg of seed
  • Drenching: 2 kg per Acre
  • Soil Application: 5 kg per Acre
  • Pit Application: For plantation crops apply 25 grams in the pit before planting.

Additional Information

  • It is compatible with the most widely used Bio-controlling agents, Plant extracts, Fertilizers & insecticides. But it should not be mixed with fungicides. Do not use fungicides at least for 15-┬¡20 days before or after the use of the product.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet

fields.Description:
Product Description

FEATURES:

  • Nemos is an eco-friendly biological nematicide based on Paceillomyces lilacinus and is highly effective in controlling Nematodes.
  • It produces hyphae inside the nematode eggs.
  • It also produces enzymes like proteases and chitinase that weakens nematodes and controls crop from Nematodes.
  • It also destroys hibernating stages of the nematodes in the soil.

BENEFITS :

  • Nemos plays an important role in the control of nematodes.
  • It is more beneficial to control the nodule at the roots cause by nematode with organic material.
  • Easy to use by drip irrigation for shed net, poly house crops.

TARGET CROPS:

  • All Vegetables, Fruits & other Crops

APPLICATION & DOASGE:

  • Soil application & Drip Irrigation :- 2 liter/ acre

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Geolife No Virus is an organic viricide made with a unique combination of herbs.
  • It is a broad-spectrum viricide, which stops virus development in plant systems.
  • It acts rapidly to inhibit the proliferation of viral infections within plants. It fosters the emergence of robust new foliage.
  • It is key for saving crop loss due to Virus with 100 % Natural and Organic product.

Geolife No Virus Technical Details

  • Technical Content:

Ingredients

Enterprise Specification

Lantana camera extract

2.00 %

Boerhavia diffusa extract

2.00 %

Bougainvillea spectabilis extract

4.00 %

Acorus calamus extract

2.00 %

Aqueous solution

90.00 %

Total

100%

 

  • Mode of Entry: This product has both contact and systemic action against viruses.
  • Mode of Action: The introduction of No Virus occurs through the stomatal opening, and it is then transported throughout the plant system via the vascular bundles. It stops viruses from entering plant cells by blocking their attachment or fusion. It does this by Interfering with the virus's outer layer or the cell's surface. It also interferes with the cell's machinery that makes proteins, which the virus needs to multiply. It has antioxidants that fight damage caused by viruses. It also stops viruses from sticking to cells by blocking special proteins on the virus. This helps in the early stages of a viral infection.

Key Features and Benefits

  • It is a Botanical Anti- Viral Product with Broad Spectrum Action.
  • It is effective to stop Virus infection in crops, hence No Virus works by encapsulating virions (infective particle of a virus) & stops it from spreading/multiplying.
  • It controls the further spread of Viral Infection and initiates new branches and leaves.
  • It helps plants to growth healthy and increase the yield of the crop.
  • Spraying Geolife No Virus in preventive application increases resistance against Viral infection.
  • It is effective against mosaic viruses, leaf curl disease, mottle virus, etc.
  • It is free from toxic chemicals and recommended for residue-free farming.

Geolife No Virus Usage and Crops

Recommended Crops:All Crops (Vegetables, Fruits, Spices, Cereals & Pulses)
Dosage:3-5 ml /1 L of water & 600 ΓÇô 1000 ml/ Acre

Target Diseases

  • Chili Mosaic Virus
  • Squash Mosaic Virus
  • Cucumber Mosaic Virus
  • Tomato Leaf Curl Virus
  • Tomato Mosaic Virus
  • Tomato Brown Rugose Fruit Virus
  • Zucchini Yellow Mosaic Virus
  • Papaya Mosaic Virus
  • Okra Mosaic Virus.

Method of Application:Foliar Spray

  • Preventive Spray: No Virus 3 ml/lit + insecticide (To control insect vector). Repeat the spray at intervals of 10-15 days, minimum 3 sprays are required.
  • Curative Spray: No Virus 5 ml/lit + insecticide (To control insect vector) + Crop Nutrient (NPK, Micronutrient, plant growth promoters). Repeat the spray at intervals of 10-15 days, minimum 2-3 sprays are required.

Note: For controlling viral disease in a curative way, the right nutrition management based on the requirement of the crop is equally important.

Additional Information

  • During the initial infection stage, No Virus (Tomato & Cucurbit Special) shows effective resistance against viruses and improves the plant immunity for recovery.
  • Geolife No Virus (Tomato & Cucurbit Special) is free from toxic chemicals and recommended for residue-free farming.
  • Rates of application will vary depending on the severity of the deficiency, climate, soil type, and method of application
  • Geolife No Virus (Tomato & Cucurbit Special) is Compatible with all Agrochemicals.

Disclaimer:This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

  • It is key for saving crop loss due to Virus with 100 % Natural and Organic product.

Geolife No Virus Technical Details

  • Technical Content:

Ingredients

Enterprise Specification

Lantana camera extract

2.00 %

Boerhavia diffusa extract

2.00 %

Bougainvillea spectabilis extract

4.00 %

Acorus calamus extract

2.00 %

Aqueous solution

90.00 %

Total

100%

 

  • Mode of Entry: This product has both contact and systemic action against viruses.
  • Mode of Action: The introduction of No Virus occurs through the stomatal opening, and it is then transported throughout the plant system via the vascular bundles. It stops viruses from entering plant cells by blocking their attachment or fusion. It does this by Interfering with the virus's outer layer or the cell's surface. It also interferes with the cell's machinery that makes proteins, which the virus needs to multiply. It has antioxidants that fight damage caused by viruses. It also stops viruses from sticking to cells by blocking special proteins on the virus. This helps in the early stages of a viral infection.

Key Features and Benefits

  • It is a Botanical Anti- Viral Product with Broad Spectrum Action.
  • It is effective to stop Virus infection in crops, hence No Virus works by encapsulating virions (infective particle of a virus) & stops it from spreading/multiplying.
  • It controls the further spread of Viral Infection and initiates new branches and leaves.
  • It helps plants to growth healthy and increase the yield of the crop.
  • Spraying Geolife No Virus in preventive application increases resistance against Viral infection.
  • It is effective against mosaic viruses, leaf curl disease, mottle virus, etc.
  • It is free from toxic chemicals and recommended for residue-free farming.

Geolife No Virus Usage and Crops

Recommended Crops:All Crops (Vegetables, Fruits, Spices, Cereals & Pulses)
Dosage:3-5 ml /1 L of water & 600 ΓÇô 1000 ml/ Acre

Target Diseases

  • Chili Mosaic Virus
  • Squash Mosaic Virus
  • Cucumber Mosaic Virus
  • Tomato Leaf Curl Virus
  • Tomato Mosaic Virus
  • Tomato Brown Rugose Fruit Virus
  • Zucchini Yellow Mosaic Virus
  • Papaya Mosaic Virus
  • Okra Mosaic Virus.

Method of Application:Foliar Spray

  • Preventive Spray: No Virus 3 ml/lit + insecticide (To control insect vector). Repeat the spray at intervals of 10-15 days, minimum 3 sprays are required.
  • Curative Spray: No Virus 5 ml/lit + insecticide (To control insect vector) + Crop Nutrient (NPK, Micronutrient, plant growth promoters). Repeat the spray at intervals of 10-15 days, minimum 2-3 sprays are required.

Note: For controlling viral disease in a curative way, the right nutrition management based on the requirement of the crop is equally important.

Additional Information

  • During the initial infection stage, No Virus (Tomato & Cucurbit Special) shows effective resistance against viruses and improves the plant immunity for recovery.
  • Geolife No Virus (Tomato & Cucurbit Special) is free from toxic chemicals and recommended for residue-free farming.
  • Rates of application will vary depending on the severity of the deficiency, climate, soil type, and method of application
  • Geolife No Virus (Tomato & Cucurbit Special) is Compatible with all Agrochemicals.

Disclaimer:This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

Product Description

About Product

  • V-Bind Viricide developed by Vanproz Agrovet, designed to combat viral diseases in plants.
  • It is a mixture of extracts of plants having medicinal properties.
  • It is made from medicinal extracts and oil of herbs. V-Bind is very effective to prevent and cure all kinds of viral disease.
  • It is particularly effective against leaf mosaic, bunchy top, and leaf curl viruses.

Vanproz V-Bind Viricide Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Unique formulation based on plant-based alkaloids
  • Mode of Action: V-Bind acts against viruses by improving systemic acquired resistance of plants binding & stop further development of virus multiplication.

Key Features and Benefits

  • Vanproz V-Bind Viricide provides a natural defense against viruses.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Quantis Syngenta is a biostimulant containing organic carbon, amino acids as well as micronutrients.
  • Quantis Syngenta technical name - Vinasse Metabolites (Amino Acids And Nutrients)
  • It enhances plant performance and reduces yield loss caused by abiotic stress conditions.
  • It triggers the plantΓÇÖs own cellular processes, to help maintain the plant structure

Quantis Syngenta Technical Details

  • Composition:

Component

Percentage

Vinasse Metabolites (Contains amino acids and nutrients)

52% W/W

Aqua

48% W/W
  • Mode of Action: Quantis Syngenta is a naturally derived bio-stimulant incorporating a combination of organic carbons, potassium, calcium and energy source carbohydrates, in the form of sugars and amino acids, that contribute to mitigating drought and heat stresses on the plant.

Key Features and Benefits

  • Maintains photosynthetic activity
  • Delays senescence. (By delaying leaf senescence, either through physiological or molecular strategies, we can achieve higher photosynthetic activity with a longer duration.)
  • Minimizes adverse effects from abiotic stresses (drought and heat)
  • Improves yield.

Quantis Syngenta Usage and Crops

  • Recommendations:

Crops

Stage

Dosage / Acre (ml)

Soybean

Single application, At the beginning of the reproductive stage

800

Cotton

1st application - At square formation, 2nd application at flower initiation

400

Rice

At maximum tillering stage

800

Wheat

One application at flag leaf stage

400

Sugarcane

One application at knee high stage

600

Apple

1st application - pink bud stage, 2nd application - 50% flowering stage

1ml/L water

Tea

2nd applications at 15 days interval

800

Black gram

One application at pre flowering stage

400
  • Method of Application: Foliar application.

Additional Information

  • Quantis Syngenta is most suitable for foliar application. The number of applications & timings depends on the crop. However, application at the time of flowering, fruit setting, ripening are the most important.

Disclaimer:This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

 

About Product

  • Multiplex Samras is a bio stimulant product designed to enhance the growth and yield of crops.
  • It is a plant-derived amino acid mixture that acts as a natural chelating agent,enhancing the uptake of major, secondary, and micronutrients.
  • Multiplex Samras promotes enzymatic activities, protein synthesis, and increases photosynthetic activity in plants.

Multiplex Samras Technical Details

  • Composition: Contains mixture of 18 natural amino acids, extracted from plant source

Key Features and Benefits

  • Samras promotes enzymatic activity within the plant system.
  • It increases photosynthesis and enhances protein synthesis.
  • It improves flower and fruit setting, and controls flower and fruit dropping.
  • It enhances the size, colour, and keeping quality of the produce.
  • It improves drought resistance in plants.
  • It boosts yield both in quality and quantity.

Multiplex Samras Usage and Crops

  • Recommended Crops: All crops
  • Dosage: 2-3 ml/ 1 L of water & 400 ΓÇô600 ml/ Acre 
  • Method of Application: Foliar spray application (Spray both sides of the leaf  or Drip application

 

Additional Information

  • Avoid mixing of Sulphur and Copper based products along with Multiplex Samras.

 

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Bhumi Mr. Raja is a Biofertilizer containing V.A.M.
  • V.A.M. is a mycorrhizal species of fungus that lives on the roots of various higher plants.
  • They develop symbiotic relationship with plants in the roots of plants.

Bhumi Mr. Raja Biofertilizer Technical Details

Technical Content

  • Total mycorrhizal viable propagules- 100 gm
  • Infectious potential- 100 i.p./g.
  • PH-6-7.5
  • Moisture content-8-12%
  • Formulation-Granular Granules

Key Features & Benefits

  • Bhumi Mr. Raja is a Black crystalline granular form and partially soluble.
  • It Provides maximum root development in the root zone which provides strength to the plants.
  • It helps in the development of white roots.
  • It Helps plants take up more nutrients and water from the soil.
  • It Increase resistance against drought and other abiotic stresses

Bhumi Mr. Raja Usage & Crops

Target Crops: All vegetables, cereals and horticultural crops.

Method of Application: Soil Application

Dosage:

  • Per liter: 50 grams per pot
  • Per acre: 4 kg per acre. First use: Use along with primary fertilizer at the time of sowing.
  • Second use: Mix it in manure or soil at an interval of 25 to 35 days.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.cardtitle: MYCO GOLD (VESICULAR ARBUSCULAR MYCORRHIZAL - VAM) GRANULES
fields.Description:
Product Description

  • Vesicular Arbuscular Mycorrhiza follows culture based on Self-Isolates from Indian Forests. VAM is a symbiotic endophytic soil fungus, which colonizes the roots of approximately 80% plants. VAM fungi produce hyphae, which are microscopic tubes that colonize crop roots and grow out into the soil further than root hairs. Nutrients are taken up by the hyphae and carried back to the plant. This results in very efficient mobilization & uptake of fertilizers and other nutrients by plants.
  • Our product surpasses all VAM technologies available in the market due to our in-house developed special formulation, which enhances crop yield.

Technical Content

  • Vesicular-Arbuscular-Mycorrhiza (VAM)

Features & Benefits

FEATURES

  • VAM produces powerful enzymes to dissolve tightly bound nutrients such as organic nitrogen, phosphorous, iron, zinc, sulphur and copper.
  • It increases the surface area of roots from 100 to 1000 times & provides better crop growth and yield.
  • It resists entry of pathogens and nematodes near plant roots.
  • It reduces symptoms incited by disease producing organisms and significantly lowers need of water and fertilizer. SFT/MP
  • Enhances uptake of applied fertilizerΓÇÖs Nitrogen.
  • It also improves biological Nitrogen fixation of legume by improving nodule formation.
  • Creates resistance to entry of pathogens and controls the population of rhizosphere microorganisms.
  • Improves drought resistance.
  • Reduces symptoms incited by disease producing organisms.
  • Significantly lowers need of watering and fertilizer

Usage

CROPS

  • It can be used for all Plants and Crops.


MODE OF ACTION

  • Fungi penetrate roots and also extend beyond the roots to absorb water and nutrients and deliver them to the plant roots. The filaments bind and aggregate soil particles. Colonies of fungi penetrate the cortical cells of roots of vascular plants and also extend far into the soil to absorb water and nutrients and deliver them directly from soil to the plant roots. Fungi excrete compounds that stimulate the plant to produce additional roots on which fungi can grow. The filaments of fungi retain moisture to bind and aggregate soil particles to improve physical soil conditions for more water infiltration, decreased surface run-off and increased water holding capacity.
    DOSAGE

  • 4kg/Acre

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Katyayani Bhumiraja is a biofertilizer developed by Katyayani Organics.
  • It contains Vesicular Arbuscular Mycorrhizae (VAM), which are beneficial fungi that form a symbiotic relationship with plant roots.
  • This eco-friendly biofertilizer grows in close relation to the roots of plants, enhancing both plant productivity and soil fertility.

Katyayani Bhumiraja Composition and Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Vesicular Arbuscular Mycorrhizae (VAM).
  • Mode of Action: Katyayani Bhumiraja Biofertilizer works by forming a symbiotic relationship with plant roots through VAM fungi. This enhances nutrient uptake (phosphorus, nitrogen, sulfur), improves water stress management, and boosts soil health, leading to better root growth and overall plant productivity.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Katyayani Bhumiraja improves the absorption of essential nutrients like phosphorus, nitrogen, and micronutrients.
  • By improving nutrient absorption, it boosts plant growth and productivity.
  • It enhances plant resistance to drought, salinity, and various soil-borne pathogens.
  • Bhumiraja supports sustainable and organic farming practices by reducing the need for chemical fertilizers.
  • It enhances soil structure and fertility, promoting better root growth.
  • Cost-Effective: It reduces the need for chemical fertilizers, lowering overall farming costs.
  • It minimizes environmental pollution and promotes biodiversity.

Katyayani Bhumiraja Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: All cash crops, Paddy, Sugarcane, Groundnut, Potato, Wheat, Cotton, Fruit crops, Banana, Mango, Pomegranate, Vegetables, Onion, Garlic, Tomato, Garden & nursery plants, turfs & Ornamental plants etc. Home garden kitchen terrace garden nursery greenhouse & for Agricultural Purposes.

Dosage:

  • Direct Broadcasting: Apply 4-8 kg per acre at the time of sowing.
  • Mixing with Compost: Mix 4-10 kg of Katyayani Mycorrhiza biofertilizer granule with 50-80 kg of farmyard manure or organic compost or vermicompost and sprinkle over the land.

Method of Application: Broadcasting or Sprinkle

Time of Application: Can be applied during planting or as a top dressing during the growing season.

Additional Information

  • Katyayani Bhumiraja can be mixed with organic fertilizers like farmyard manure, compost, and vermicompost. This enhances nutrient availability and soil health.
  • While it is compatible with many pesticides and fungicides, itΓÇÖs advisable to avoid mixing it with highly acidic or alkaline chemicals to maintain the efficacy of the mycorrhizae.
  • Produces more biomass.
  • Ideal for flowering plants.

fields.Description_of_product:
Product Description

About Product

  • Katyayani Bhumiraja is a biofertilizer developed by Katyayani Organics.
  • It contains Vesicular Arbuscular Mycorrhizae (VAM), which are beneficial fungi that form a symbiotic relationship with plant roots.
  • This eco-friendly biofertilizer grows in close relation to the roots of plants, enhancing both plant productivity and soil fertility.

Katyayani Bhumiraja Composition and Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Vesicular Arbuscular Mycorrhizae (VAM).
  • Mode of Action: Katyayani Bhumiraja Biofertilizer works by forming a symbiotic relationship with plant roots through VAM fungi. This enhances nutrient uptake (phosphorus, nitrogen, sulfur), improves water stress management, and boosts soil health, leading to better root growth and overall plant productivity.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Katyayani Bhumiraja improves the absorption of essential nutrients like phosphorus, nitrogen, and micronutrients.
  • By improving nutrient absorption, it boosts plant growth and productivity.
  • It enhances plant resistance to drought, salinity, and various soil-borne pathogens.
  • Bhumiraja supports sustainable and organic farming practices by reducing the need for chemical fertilizers.
  • It enhances soil structure and fertility, promoting better root growth.
  • Cost-Effective: It reduces the need for chemical fertilizers, lowering overall farming costs.
  • It minimizes environmental pollution and promotes biodiversity.

Katyayani Bhumiraja Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: All cash crops, Paddy, Sugarcane, Groundnut, Potato, Wheat, Cotton, Fruit crops, Banana, Mango, Pomegranate, Vegetables, Onion, Garlic, Tomato, Garden & nursery plants, turfs & Ornamental plants etc. Home garden kitchen terrace garden nursery greenhouse & for Agricultural Purposes.

Dosage:

  • Direct Broadcasting: Apply 4-8 kg per acre at the time of sowing.
  • Mixing with Compost: Mix 4-10 kg of Katyayani Mycorrhiza biofertilizer granule with 50-80 kg of farmyard manure or organic compost or vermicompost and sprinkle over the land.

Method of Application: Broadcasting or Sprinkle

Time of Application: Can be applied during planting or as a top dressing during the growing season.

Additional Information

  • Katyayani Bhumiraja can be mixed with organic fertilizers like farmyard manure, compost, and vermicompost. This enhances nutrient availability and soil health.
  • While it is compatible with many pesticides and fungicides, itΓÇÖs advisable to avoid mixing it with highly acidic or alkaline chemicals to maintain the efficacy of the mycorrhizae.
  • Produces more biomass.
  • Ideal for flowering plants.
  • Protect plants from nematodes and soil borne diseases roots.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Bhumi Mr. Raja is a Biofertilizer containing V.A.M.
  • V.A.M. is a mycorrhizal species of fungus that lives on the roots of various higher plants.
  • They develop symbiotic relationship with plants in the roots of plants.

Bhumi Mr. Raja Biofertilizer Technical Details

Technical Content

  • Total mycorrhizal viable propagules- 100 gm
  • Infectious potential- 100 i.p./g.
  • PH-6-7.5
  • Moisture content-8-12%
  • Formulation-Granular Granules

Key Features & Benefits

  • Bhumi Mr. Raja is a Black crystalline granular form and partially soluble.
  • It Provides maximum root development in the root zone which provides strength to the plants.
  • It helps in the development of white roots.
  • It Helps plants take up more nutrients and water from the soil.
  • It Increase resistance against drought and other abiotic stresses

Bhumi Mr. Raja Usage & Crops

Target Crops: All vegetables, cereals and horticultural crops.

Method of Application: Soil Application

Dosage:

  • Per liter: 50 grams per pot
  • Per acre: 4 kg per acre. First use: Use along with primary fertilizer at the time of sowing.
  • Second use: Mix it in manure or soil at an interval of 25 to 35 days.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.cardtitle: MYCO GOLD (VESICULAR ARBUSCULAR MYCORRHIZAL - VAM) GRANULES
fields.Description:
Product Description

  • Vesicular Arbuscular Mycorrhiza follows culture based on Self-Isolates from Indian Forests. VAM is a symbiotic endophytic soil fungus, which colonizes the roots of approximately 80% plants. VAM fungi produce hyphae, which are microscopic tubes that colonize crop roots and grow out into the soil further than root hairs. Nutrients are taken up by the hyphae and carried back to the plant. This results in very efficient mobilization & uptake of fertilizers and other nutrients by plants.
  • Our product surpasses all VAM technologies available in the market due to our in-house developed special formulation, which enhances crop yield.

Technical Content

  • Vesicular-Arbuscular-Mycorrhiza (VAM)

Features & Benefits

FEATURES

  • VAM produces powerful enzymes to dissolve tightly bound nutrients such as organic nitrogen, phosphorous, iron, zinc, sulphur and copper.
  • It increases the surface area of roots from 100 to 1000 times & provides better crop growth and yield.
  • It resists entry of pathogens and nematodes near plant roots.
  • It reduces symptoms incited by disease producing organisms and significantly lowers need of water and fertilizer. SFT/MP
  • Enhances uptake of applied fertilizerΓÇÖs Nitrogen.
  • It also improves biological Nitrogen fixation of legume by improving nodule formation.
  • Creates resistance to entry of pathogens and controls the population of rhizosphere microorganisms.
  • Improves drought resistance.
  • Reduces symptoms incited by disease producing organisms.
  • Significantly lowers need of watering and fertilizer

Usage

CROPS

  • It can be used for all Plants and Crops.


MODE OF ACTION

  • Fungi penetrate roots and also extend beyond the roots to absorb water and nutrients and deliver them to the plant roots. The filaments bind and aggregate soil particles. Colonies of fungi penetrate the cortical cells of roots of vascular plants and also extend far into the soil to absorb water and nutrients and deliver them directly from soil to the plant roots. Fungi excrete compounds that stimulate the plant to produce additional roots on which fungi can grow. The filaments of fungi retain moisture to bind and aggregate soil particles to improve physical soil conditions for more water infiltration, decreased surface run-off and increased water holding capacity.


DOSAGE

  • 4kg/Acre

fields.Description:
Product Description

 

About Product

  • Multiplex Sulphur Liquid Fertilizer is a solution containing elemental sulfur dissolved in water.
  • This versatile fertilizer can be applied directly to the soil or sprayed on plant leaves.
  • It plays a crucial role in plant growth by enhancing nutrient uptake, improving yield and quality, and promoting overall plant health.
  • This fertilizer is suitable for a wide range of crops, including cereals, vegetables, fruits, and oilseeds
  • It can also be used as a soil amendment.

Multiplex Sulphur Liquid Fertilizer Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Sulphur 20%
  • Type of Fertilizer: It is a Sulphur based fertilizer.

Key Features and Benefits

  • It keeps the plant healthy and vigorous and thus increases the yield and quality of produce.
  • It causes frost resistance in winter crops and disease and pest tolerance.
  • It helps correct sulfur deficiencies in the soil, ensuring a favorable environment for plant growth and development.

Multiplex Sulphur Liquid Fertilizer Usage and Crops

  • Recommended Crops: All crops
  • Dosage: 2.5 ml/ 1 L of water
  • Method of Application: Foliar application, Soil application & Drip irrigation

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Tata Surplus is a micronutrient fertilizer offered by Rallis India Limited.
  • It is designed to provide essential micronutrients to various crops.
  • It helps in balanced nutrient supply to crop plants and improve plant health.
  • Surplus improves quality and quantity of crop yield.

Tata Surplus Micronutrient Fertilizer Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Contains Boron 20%
  • Mode of Action: Surplus fertilizer is sprayed directly onto the leaves of the plants. The chelation process ensures that the micronutrients remain soluble and easily absorbed by the plant tissues. This method allows for rapid and efficient uptake of essential micronutrients such as Zinc, Magnesium, Copper, Manganese, Iron, Molybdenum, and Boron.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Tata Surplus Micronutrient Fertilizer enhances the overall health, growth, and development of crops.
  • It promotes better growth and higher yields in various crops.
  • It helps crops develop resistance to pests and diseases.
  • It is suitable for a wide range of crops including cereals, pulses, oilseeds, vegetables, cotton, sugarcane, and fruit crops.
  • It ensures that plants receive necessary nutrients at critical growth stages.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Katyayani NPK 19:19:19 is a water-soluble and balanced fertilizer that contains all the required nutrients for plants.
  • It contains Nitrogen, Phosphorus, and Potassium, which are crucial for the vegetative and reproductive activities of plants.
  • It is beneficial for plant growth, increasing biomass production, and improving the bearing of flowers and fruits, as well as their quality.
  • Plants can rapidly absorb nutrients, leading to noticeable and swift enhancements in crop growth and health.

Katyayani NPK 19:19:19 Water Soluble Fertilizer Technical Details

  • Technical Content: 19% Nitrogen (N), 19% Phosphorus (P), and 19% Potassium (K)
  • Mode of Action: Katyayani NPK 19:19:19 is a water-soluble fertilizer that delivers an equal ratio of essential nutrients. This balanced formulation ensures that plants receive comprehensive support throughout various growth stages, from seedling establishment to flowering and fruiting. The water-soluble nature of the fertilizer allows for quick dissolution and easy uptake by plants, ensuring that nutrients are readily available when needed.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Katyayani NPK 19:19:19 provides a balanced combination of Nitrogen, Phosphorus, and Potassium, which are essential for the plantΓÇÖs vegetative and reproductive activities.
  • It is suitable for a wide range of crops, including vegetables, fruits, and ornamental plants.
  • It promotes vigorous plant growth, leading to an increase in biomass production.
  • It contributes to better flowering and fruiting, which can result in an improved yield of crops.
  • It helps in improving the quality of the flowers and fruits produced.
  • The water-soluble nature of the fertilizer ensures that nutrients are readily available for uptake by plants.
  • It can be applied through foliar spray or drip irrigation systems, making it convenient for farmers.

Katyayani NPK 19:19:19 Water Soluble Fertilizer Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: All Crops

Method of Application & Dosage:

  • Soil Application: 1 Kg/ Acre
  • Foliar Spray: 2 g/L of water

(It can be applied in different stages of the crop: seedling stage, vegetative stage, reproductive stage and ripening stage.)

Additional Information

Pesticides and fungicides are very compatible with this product, all pesticides and fungicides can be mixed when applying NPK.

Key Roles of NPK in Plant Nutrition

  • Nitrogen (N): It is crucial for leaf growth and the green coloration of plants, aiding in photosynthesis.
  • Phosphorus (P): It supports the development of roots, flowers, and seeds, playing a key role in energy transfer within the plant.
  • Potassium (K): It helps in overall plant health, strengthening resistance against diseases and adverse conditions like drought.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.cardtitle: Katyayani Activated Humic + Fulvic Acid Fertilizer
fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Katyayani Activated Humic Acid + Fulvic Acid 98 is an Eco-Friendly Biologically Activated product is an excellent input in modern agriculture.
  • It stimulates root development and overall plant growth, leading to higher yields and better-quality crops.
  • Made from organic sources, it is safe for use in home gardens, potted plants, and agricultural fields.

Katyayani Activated Humic Acid + Fulvic Acid 98 Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Humic Acid and Fulvic Acid 98%
  • Mode of action: Humic and fulvic acids act as natural chelators, binding essential minerals and nutrients in the soil to form stable complexes that are easily absorbed by plant roots. Their high cationic exchange capacity (CEC) allows them to hold onto positively charged ions like calcium, magnesium, and potassium, ensuring these nutrients remain available for plant uptake. This chelation process enhances nutrient availability and mobility, leading to improved plant growth and development.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Katyayani Activated Humic Acid + Fulvic Acid 98 improves overall root development of the plant.
  • Katyayani Humic acid and Fulvic acid fertilizer largely stabilize nitrogen, release lock-up phosphorus in soil, and increase soil water holding capacity.
  • The formulation stimulates production of plant enzymes.
  • Katyayani Activated Humic Acid + Fulvic Acid 98 also Improves soil fertility and microorganisms and enhances the development of microflora populations in soils.

Katyayani Activated Humic Acid + Fulvic Acid 98 Usage and Crops

Recommended Crops: Rice, wheat, sugarcane, orchards, cotton chilies, banana, soybean, groundnut, vegetables, fruits, flowers, major plantation crops, medicinal and aromatic plants, and all other commercial crops.

Dosage (General):

  • Foliar spray ΓÇô 800 gm / Acre (7 to 10 gm / L of water)
  • Soil application ΓÇô 2 kg / Acre (with urea or other manures)
  • Drip irrigation ΓÇô 2kg / Acre

Method of application & Dosage Crop Wise

Crops

Time of Application & Dosage

Fruits (Mango, Lichi, Guava, Lemon, Orange Grape Banana, Papaya):

After 15 days of planting, spray 10 gm / 15 L of water every 10-12 days interval till fruiting.

Vegetables

After 15 days of sowing, spray 15 gm /15 L of water every 10-12 days interval till fruiting.

Potato

After 15 days of sowing, spray 15 gm / 15 L of water every 10-12 days interval till fruiting

Paddy, Jute, Wheat, Barley, Mustard, Til Ground nut, Sunflower, Soybean, Cotton

After 15 days of sowing spray, 15 gm / 15 L of water every 10-12 days interval till fruiting

Flowers

After 15 days of sowing 10-15 gm / 15 L of water every 10-12 days interval

Additional Information

  • Humic Acid Improves physical, chemical, and biological properties of soil resulting in improved crop quality.
  • Fulvic acid enhances the plantΓÇÖs natural processes in an effective way to increase plant strength without using synthetic compounds. It helps in better Chelation which makes more nutrients available to your crops.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purpose only. Always follow to the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Jivras is a bio-stimulant offered by Multiplex.
  • Multiplex Jivras contain Humic acid 12 percent and Fulvic acid 2 percent.
  • It is the end product of microbial degradation of plant debris which is one of the most important constituents to improve soil fertility and physical condition.

Multiplex Jivras Biostimulant Composition & Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Humic acid 12.0% and Fulvic acid 2%
  • Mode of Action: It acts as a chelating agent, growth stimulant and a catalyst that transforms the applied nutrients to readily available form for plant growth.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Multiplex Jivras stimulates seed germination and faster growth of seedlings.
  • Improves root proliferation, root mass and total biomass.
  • Increases the root respiration and stimulates growth of beneficial microorganisms.
  • Improves the uptake of plant nutrients from the applied fertilizer.
  • Increases water and nutrient holding capacity of the soil.
  • It chelates water soluble inorganic fertilizers applied to soil and releases them slowly to plants and increases the buffering capacity of soil.
  • Jivras Multiplex improves the yield both by quality and quantity

Multiplex Jivras Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: All crops

Dosage & Method of Application

  • Soil Application: Apply 1.5 L / Acre through irrigation.
  • Urea Treatment: Apply 500-1000ml to 100 Kg urea. The urea will turn brown in colour. After 2 hrs of treatment urea can be applied to the soil.
  • Foliar Application: Dissolve 3.0 ml / 1 L of water and spray on both sides of the leaves.
  • Seed Treatment: Dissolve 100 ml / 1 L of water. Treat the seeds in this solution for one hour before sowing.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

 

About Product

  • Multiplex Flower Booster is multi micronutrient fertilizer which contains essential nutrients like Mg, Ca, B, Zn etc. required for better flowering.
  • It can be used for all kinds of garden plants and orchids, etc.
  • After the application of the Multiplex Flower Booster usually plants give more flowers and hence repeat the application of both organic and inorganic fertilizer so that continuous flower production is maintained.

Technical Details

  • Contains all essential nutrients - major, second and trace elements in easily available form.

Key Features and Benefits

  • It increases flower production.
  • It keeps plants healthy, greener and very attractive.
  • It increases the number of flowers, plant size and keeping quality of cut flowers.
  • It maintains the original color, aroma and keeping quality of cut flowers after harvest, which includes other flowers in general.

Multiplex Flower Booster Usage and Crops

  • Recommended Crops:ΓÇ» All garden plants.
  • Dosage:ΓÇ» 4 gm or 4 ml in one litre of water.
  • Method of Application: Foliar Spray or sprinkle the solution on leaves, branches and stem of plants. Repeat spray after 20 days

 

Additional Information

  • Immediately after applying the Multiplex Flower, ensure sufficient moisture is maintained in the soil supporting the plant.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

 

About Product

  • Multiplex Kranti Micronutrient is a complete plant food and a bio stimulant product.
  • It contains all essential plant nutrients and any of the nutrients in this product are in a chelated form which can be easily absorbed by the plants.
  • The bio-activators in Multiplex Kranti considerably increase the crop productivity both by quality and quantity with just two foliar applications.

Multiplex Kranti Micronutrient Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Contains essential plant nutrients like Major, Secondary and Micronutrients in chelated form. Major nutrients like N, P, K Secondary Nutrient Ca, Mg, S Multi-micronutrients like Zinc, Manganese, Iron, Copper, Boron & Molybdenum

Key Features and Benefits

  • Kranti Micronutrient provides all required nutrients to the plant.
  • It increases the vigor of plants.
  • It helps plants to resist changes in environmental stress in a better way.
  • It improves the growth, yield, and quality of the produce significantly.
  • It improves keeping quality of the produce.
  • It improves the yield both by quality and quantity

Multiplex Kranti Micronutrient Usage and Crops

Recommended Crops: All crops
Dosage: 2 ΓÇô 2.5 ml/1 L of water & 400 to 500 ml/Acre

Method of Application: Foliar Spray & Drip Irrigation

  • First spray: 30 to 35 days after germination
  • Second spray: 15 days after first spray.

Additional Information

  • Multiplex Kranti Micronutrient is compatible with the majority of pesticides, fungicides and fertilizers that are commonly used.
  • Promising changes in appearance of the plant are noticed within 6 to 7 days after the spray.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

Key Points for Nutrifeed Forage

  • High Biomass Yield(50 % more than SSG products), Suitable for Multi-cutting.
  • Drought tolerant once established.
  • No risk of prussic acid poisoning and is suitable for early feeding.
  • High Protein and Nutrient Value(12-16% crude protein).
  • High palatability.
  • IVMD 61.3%
  • High metabolizable energy.
  • Nutrifeed is tolerant to most pests and diseases and requires almost negligible investment for their control.
  • Nutrifeed gives disease and pest free green forage for better health of animals.
  • High digestibility renders less feed quantity per animal and less forage is for cultivation.
  • High nutritional fodder helps in the better health of the animal.

Seed rate: 3 kg per care

==================================

Agronomy & Management

Soil:

Fodder crops can be grown well on a wide range of soil types Soil pH should be 5.5 to 7.0, and Avoid acidic and saline soils. Drained soils yield well.

Water & Irrigation:

Nutrifeed is tolerant to drought but should irrigate before 7 days intervals in summer and 12 days intervals in the rainy season. For better palatability crop should be with high moisture. Sufficient irrigation will boost the healthy and expected bio-mass yield in forage crops.

Sowings:

Although Nutrifeed is comparatively easy to establish, prepare a good seedbed for good germination and root development. Where irrigation is available, the better establishment will be obtained by pre-watering and sowing into moisture, rather than watering after sowing. Sowing depth 3cm to 5 cm with soil covering for compaction Row to Row Spacing is 30 cm and Plant to Plant is 25 cm

Sowing Type:

Ridges & Furrows:

For staggered sowing, harvesting, irrigation and fertigation ridges and furrows method is very successful to get high yield and high-quality fodder.

Blocks Method:

The blocks method is another successful method in forage cultivation. Farmer can harvest the fodder as per in requirement and irrigate the same block.

Sowing Time:

Spring - Feb to April

Kharif - May to August

Rabi (Central India and South India only) - September to October

Seed Rate:

2 to 3 Kg per Acre

Spacing:

Nutrifeed spacing is row to row 30 cm X plant to plant 25 cm

Cutting & Harvesting:

Nutrifeed can cut and feed at any time but 1 meter to 1.2 meters is idle height to get more benefits from green fodder in terms of nutritive values. Nutrifeed should be cut 6 to 8 inches above ground level when harvesting to promote faster re-growth for multi-cut.

Post Cutting Activities:

Apply adequate nitrogen and water for the regeneration of fresh leaves and Stems.

More Info

Fertilizer:

Fertilizer should use according to the soil test results.

N-30 Kg (60 Kg Urea),

P-25 Kg (45 Kg DAP or 120 kg SSP),

K-10 Kg (20 Kg Potash) per Acre is recommended for Nutrifeed.

Adequate nitrogen will ensure the crop's fast growth and quick recovery after cutting. Apply Nitrogen as a top dressing to get optimum benefit.

Weed Control

Weeds in Nutrifeed can be easily controlled by spraying 1 Kg Atrazine 50% WP per 1 acre.

Insect & Disease Management

From past experience, No pests and diseases have been observed. Please follow the guidelines of the company executive for control measures.

Fertilizer should use according to the soil test results.

N-30 Kg (60 Kg Urea),

P-25 Kg (45 Kg DAP or 120 kg SSP),

K-10 Kg (20 Kg Potash) per Acre is recommended for Nutrifeed.

Adequate nitrogen will ensure the crop's fast growth and quick recovery after cutting. Apply Nitrogen as a top dressing to get optimum benefit.

Weed Control

Weeds in Nutrifeed can be easily controlled by spraying 1 Kg Atrazine 50% WP per 1 acre.

Insect & Disease Management

From past experience, No pests and diseases have been observed. Please follow the guidelines of the company executive for control measures.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Equvinox is a liquid that balances the pH of water for spray solutions offered by Multiplex.
  • It helps in the conversion of unsuitable water to suitable water for preparing spray solution.

Equvinox Technical Details

  • Composition: It has an active ingredient that neutralize alkaline water to bring the pH to a desirable range

Key Features & Benefits

  • Equvinox increases the efficiency of pesticides.
  • It improves foliar applied nutrient use efficiency.
  • It reduces the number of sprays.

Equvinox Usage & Method of Application

  • Add Multiplex Equvinox to the water for spray solutions.
  • The water will change to dark red.
  • Keep adding Multiplex Equvinox until the color changes to aqua blue.
  • Aqua blue means the pH is in the desired range.

Additional Information

  • First, treat the water with Multiplex EQUVINOX and then mix pesticide or nutrient fertilizer.
  • Do not add Multiplex EQUVINOX if the product contains lime, lime sulphur, Bordeaux mixture, carbonate, hydride, etc.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

Key Features

  • Sugargraze Forage (Hybrid Sweet Sorghum) is a high yielding nutritious fodder, suitable for single cut
  • High Brix 16% to 18 % with high protein (11-13%) and high metabolizable Energy
  • It can be tolerant to Drought.
  • It is a sweet sorghum with excellent sugar levels.
  • Sugargraze Forage is highly suitable for silage making and it is also called as ΓÇ£Silage SpecialistΓÇ¥

Sugargraze Forage Characteristics

  • Good Sustainability and Wider Adaptability
  • High Brix 16 % to 18 % with High Protein (11 ΓÇô 13%) and high metabolizable energy
  • Tall,thick,juicy stems with soft inter-nodes
  • More digestibility & Palatability
  • Suitable for silage
  • High dry matter
  • Drought tolerance

Sowing Details

  • Sowing Season & Recommended States:

Season

States

Khari

KA, AP, TN, TS, MH, MP, GJ, RJ, HR, PB, UP, OR,JK

Rabi

KA,AP,TN,TS,MH,MP,GJ, RJ, HR, PB, UP, OR, BH,JK

Summer

KA, AP,TN,TS,MH,MP,GJ,RJ,HR,PB,UP,OR,BH,JK
  • Seed Rate: 6 kg per Acre.
  • Spacing: (Row-Row): 25 cm , (Plant-Plant): 10 cm
  • First Harvest: Sugargraze Forage can be cut at 40 to 50 days age and for Silage 75 to 90 days age is the suitable.

Additional Information

  • Sugargraze Forage should irrigate before 7 days intervals in summer and 12 days interval in rainy season.
  • For better palatability crop should be with high moisture. Sufficient irrigation will boost the healthy and expected bio-mass yield in forage crops.
  • Fodder crops can be grown well on a wide range of soil types of Soil pH should be 6.5 to 7.0, Avoid acidic and saline soils.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

Tapas Silage Cultureis produced from green grass through controlled Anaerobic fermentation and process of Preservation is done in receptacle called SILO. In anaerobic condition (no air inside pit/tank),with the help of micro organisms, sugar contained in green fodder is converted in to Lactic acid ,which help to preserve the green fodder for longer duration. Silage preparation is one of the important methods for storage of green fodder for dairy animals.

Composition:Each Kg contains

  • Lactobacillus plantaram
  • Lactic Acid Bacillus
  • Lactobacillus acidophilus
  • Enterococcus faecium
  • Additives for bacteria to grow fast on silage

Dosage:

  • 100gm/1000Kg of green fodder

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Dr. Rich is an innovative product which helps to reduce and stabilize pH, TDS & EC of water.
  • It enhances the effectiveness of all pesticides.

Anand Agro Dr. Rich Technical Details

  • Mode of Action: Dr. Rich is very innovative product from Anand Agro Care which helps not only to maintain pH of spray solution but also it stabilizes their pH for longer period of time.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Dr. Rich (pH stabilizer) purifies water thereby making it easier for absorption.
  • The only effective product to reduce the salinity of the water.
  • It maintains the pH of water for a long time.
  • The effects of GA are more effective when it is taken for dipping, resulting in an increase in production.

Dr. Rich (ph Stabilizer) Usage & Crops

  • Recommended Crops: All Crops
  • Dosage: 0.5 ml/ liter, 0.1 ml/ liter
  • Method of Application: Foliar application, Dipping

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Quantis Syngenta is a biostimulant containing organic carbon, amino acids as well as micronutrients.
  • Quantis Syngenta technical name - Vinasse Metabolites (Amino Acids And Nutrients)
  • It enhances plant performance and reduces yield loss caused by abiotic stress conditions.
  • It triggers the plantΓÇÖs own cellular processes, to help maintain the plant structure

Quantis Syngenta Technical Details

  • Composition:

Component

Percentage

Vinasse Metabolites (Contains amino acids and nutrients)

52% W/W

Aqua

48% W/W
  • Mode of Action: Quantis Syngenta is a naturally derived bio-stimulant incorporating a combination of organic carbons, potassium, calcium and energy source carbohydrates, in the form of sugars and amino acids, that contribute to mitigating drought and heat stresses on the plant.

Key Features and Benefits

  • Maintains photosynthetic activity
  • Delays senescence. (By delaying leaf senescence, either through physiological or molecular strategies, we can achieve higher photosynthetic activity with a longer duration.)
  • Minimizes adverse effects from abiotic stresses (drought and heat)
  • Improves yield.

Quantis Syngenta Usage and Crops

  • Recommendations:

Crops

Stage

Dosage / Acre (ml)

Soybean

Single application, At the beginning of the reproductive stage

800

Cotton

1st application - At square formation, 2nd application at flower initiation

400

Rice

At maximum tillering stage

800

Wheat

One application at flag leaf stage

400

Sugarcane

One application at knee high stage

600

Apple

1st application - pink bud stage, 2nd application - 50% flowering stage

1ml/L water

Tea

2nd applications at 15 days interval

800

Black gram

One application at pre flowering stage

400
  • Method of Application: Foliar application.

Additional Information

  • Quantis Syngenta is most suitable for foliar application. The number of applications & timings depends on the crop. However, application at the time of flowering, fruit setting, ripening are the most important.

Disclaimer:This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

 

About Product

  • Multiplex Samras is a bio stimulant product designed to enhance the growth and yield of crops.
  • It is a plant-derived amino acid mixture that acts as a natural chelating agent,enhancing the uptake of major, secondary, and micronutrients.
  • Multiplex Samras promotes enzymatic activities, protein synthesis, and increases photosynthetic activity in plants.

Multiplex Samras Technical Details

  • Composition: Contains mixture of 18 natural amino acids, extracted from plant source

Key Features and Benefits

  • Samras promotes enzymatic activity within the plant system.
  • It increases photosynthesis and enhances protein synthesis.
  • It improves flower and fruit setting, and controls flower and fruit dropping.
  • It enhances the size, colour, and keeping quality of the produce.
  • It improves drought resistance in plants.
  • It boosts yield both in quality and quantity.

Multiplex Samras Usage and Crops

  • Recommended Crops: All crops
  • Dosage: 2-3 ml/ 1 L of water & 400 ΓÇô600 ml/ Acre 
  • Method of Application: Foliar spray application (Spray both sides of the leaf  or Drip application

 

Additional Information

  • Avoid mixing of Sulphur and Copper based products along with Multiplex Samras.

 

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Mahaphal is a bio stimulant offered by Multiplex.
  • A combination product of bio-organics and traces of micronutrients in balanced quantity in chelated form.
  • Multiplex Mahaphal is useful for all horticultural and agricultural crops.

Multiplex Mahaphal Composition & Technical Details

  • Composition: Contains seaweed extract, amino acid mixture, vermi wash, humic acid, fulvic acid and plant nutrients namely zinc, copper, magnesium, iron and manganese in chelated form.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Impart lush green colour to foliage improving photosynthetic activity.
  • Multiplex Mahaphal improves resistance to diseases & pests.
  • Helps in inducing more flowers, fruit setting and results in getting good quality fruits.
  • Helps in stimulating plant hormones and thereby improves absorption and utilization of applied plant nutrients.
  • Improves efficiency of water usage.
  • Strengthens stress tolerance and helps in speedy recovery.
  • Improves the yield both by quality and quantity

Multiplex Mahaphal Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: All crops

Dosage: 2.0-2.5 ml / 1 L of water.

Method of Application: Foliar spray

  • Spray on both surfaces of the leaves.
  • Repeat the spray at an interval of 20-25 days. 3-4 applications during the development stage are recommended.

Additional Information

  • To get better results, it is recommended to apply Multiplex Mahapal along with Multiplex Chamak at the rate of three grams or Multiplex Allbor at the rate of one gram in one liter of prepared solution during flower blooming, fruit set and fruit development.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • MPGS INDIA AGROTECHΓÇÖs ΓÇ£Calci On D+ΓÇ¥ is a unique blend of highly bioavailable and effective Calcium supplement for poultry birds. ΓÇ£Calci On D+ΓÇ¥ contains high quality injectable grade Calcium Gluconate along with Calcium lactate and Calcium citrate which can be absorb easily and helps to maintain Calcium level in blood. This product is fortified with Vit D3, Magnesium, Phosphate, Iron and other trace elements which improves performance of Poultry bird and improves bone mineral density which increase overall body weight and better egg shell density to reduce breakage during handling and transportation

Features & Benefits

BENEFITS

  • Bioavailable Calcium with Magnesium and Phosphate
  • Contains Vitamin D3 which improves assimilation of Calcium in bone
  • Injectable grade Calcium gluconate used for better quality and purity
  • Iron present in ΓÇ£Calci On D+ΓÇ¥ helps build healthy blood
  • Improves strength of legs to improve activity
  • Decreases feather eating and reduce stress or chances of infection
  • Improves FCR and reduce feed cost
  • Improves growth rate and quick maturity
  • Improves hatch ability to increase egg production
  • Prevents from rickets, osteomalacia, anaemia, cannibalism etc.

DOSAGE

  • (per 100 birds)
  • 5 to 7 days Chicks 5 ml
  • 15 to 20 days broiler 10 ml
  • 30 days above 15 ml
  • Layers 10 ml
  • or as directed by Nutritionist or Veterinarian

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Bayer Ambition is a balanced formulation with organic amino acids, fulvic acid, and micronutrients to enhance the efficiency of the crop. It helps in growing new shoots and new buds, improving flower retention, higher fruit setting, and yield.
  • Plant growth regulators like fulvic acid improve plant stress tolerance and nutrient absorption and work better with other treatments like insecticides and fungicides.

Bayer Ambition Technical Details

  • Technical Composition: Amino acid, fulvic acid and micro element.
  • Mode of Action: Bayer Ambition is a combination of amino acids and fulvic acid. Amino acids help plants grow new shoots and buds, improve flower retention, fruit set, and yield. Fulvic acid is effective in biotic and abiotic stress management, has better absorption of nutrients, and has a synergistic effect on tank mix partners.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Growth: Better crop establishment, high vegetative vigour.
  • Vitality: Better flower retention and increased reproductive vigour.
  • Performance: Better fruit/boll retention, higher marketable produce.

Product Description

About Product

  • Bayer Ambition is a balanced formulation with organic amino acids, fulvic acid, and micronutrients to enhance the efficiency of the crop. It helps in growing new shoots and new buds, improving flower retention, higher fruit setting, and yield.
  • Plant growth regulators like fulvic acid improve plant stress tolerance and nutrient absorption and work better with other treatments like insecticides and fungicides.

Bayer Ambition Technical Details

  • Technical Composition: Amino acid, fulvic acid and micro element.
  • Mode of Action: Bayer Ambition is a combination of amino acids and fulvic acid. Amino acids help plants grow new shoots and buds, improve flower retention, fruit set, and yield. Fulvic acid is effective in biotic and abiotic stress management, has better absorption of nutrients, and has a synergistic effect on tank mix partners.

Key Features & Benefits

First time it has been fortified with Papaya leaf extract, Spirulina extract, Garlic extract, Turmeric extract etc. which provides natural immunity against viral diseases, common infection, fungal disease and many other tropical illness. Vital herbs that detoxify liver cells and rejuvenate them to function properly. Removes toxins and helps to recover from side effects of medicines and treatments

Features & Benefits

BENEFITS

  • Formulated with Spirulina, Garlic and Papaya leaf extract
  • Helps to recover liver damage due to food/water/disease toxicity
  • Helps to fight against viral infections and common diseases
  • Improves, digestion, improve FCR and better liver function
  • Improve egg production and reproductive power
  • Helps to cure fatty liver problem and other hepatic conditions
  • Natural herbal flavour for better acceptance
  • Improves hatchability and egg production

  • (per 100 birds)

  • Or as recommended by the Nutritionist/Veterinarian

fields.Description:
Product Description

ABOUT PRODUCT

  • Perfekt herbal crop health enhancer is a synergistic organic concoction of bio-activates extracted from unique & exotic herbs and medicinal plants and has applications for agriculture crops and is suitable for various agriculture crops of vegetables, fruits, cereals & pulses.

Technical Content

  • The same herbals involved inherently contains inbuilt biologically derived nitrogen, phosphates, potassium, calcium, manganese, chlorine, sodium, magnesium, iron, sulphur hormones, enzymes, vitamins and all essential amino acids in traces and when fed through leaf surface gives wonderful and enormous crop health to plants.



 

Features & Benefits

BENEFITS

  • Control all the microbes VIZ, Virus, fungus, Bacteria and macrophomina
  • Ovicidal, Antefeedent and Larvicidal to just hatched on contact.
  • Repels sucking pests like Aphids, Thrips, Jassids, Whitefly and Coccids
  • Minimises root rot and nematode damage if applied in early stages.
  • Increases chlorophyll and proteins as a result plants becomes green.
  • Stimulates growth, gives new leaves and flowers quickly and stops flower shedding.
  • Induces drought resistance by minimising, transpiration losses.

Usage

Mode Of Action

  • The insoluble mineral substances found in the soil have to be dissolved by the acid juices of the fibres of the rootlets before they can reach the vegetative tissue. The inorganic substances which serve plants for nutrition are taken up by them in minimal minute quantities in greatly diluted state.
  • It is observed that strongest manures and fertilizers cannot be compared in its action with a much smaller quantity of finely divided nutrient substances which by its subdivisions can be diffused through out. Each rootlet requires a small quantity of nourishment where it is in contact with soil , but for functional activity and existence, it is requisite that this minimum be present just at the spot in leaves. Hence a small dose and repetition of PERTFEKT foliar spray will attain the desired action, because of quick permeability.
  • Bioavailability is a problem in most of the foliar sprays in wettable powder form dissolved in water. The herbal extracts of PERFEKT are dissolved in high performance solvents, and hence readily mixes with water evenly and thus has better bioavailability.
  • On Foliar application of perfekt to the point of dripping the active ingredients are quickly absorbed by the plants, and due to enzymatic action, the virus inside the cell is exposed and gets deactivated. Due to this unique action, the spreading of viruses stopped, so that the tender leaves and sprouts are prevented from infection by viruses and also ensures healthy sprout and leaves speedy growth in order to facilitate, adequate leaf area for photosynthesis and required energy for plant to survive this virus attack.

Dosage

  • Seed treatment can be done by dipping the seeds in a solution of one ml perfekt in one lit of water for half an hour to one hour and then after drying in shade, should be sown immediately.
  • Similarly nursery seedlings can be dipped in 1ml perfekt in 1 litre solution for an hour before transplanting.
  • For all plants at any stage give half ml per litre of water. If the disease is more use one ml in one litre of water in first application and half ml per litre of water in subsequent applications.
  • In case of hardy plants like capsicum one ml in 1 litre of water is suggested.
  • In case of power operated sprayers use 15 ml in 10 litres of water.
  • As per the condition and seriousness of the crop disease, perfekt spray has to be repeated in 5 to 7 days; for effective cure, because some plants which are seriously attacked take more time and need more dosage.
  • Root drenching in soil can be done for root diseases, induces new root growth.

Crops

  • All Crops

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Multiplex Orthosil contains beneficial element Silicon, which improves resistance to water stress and helps plants to fight temperature stress up to 41 C.
  • It also increases the reproductive rate in plants.
  • Silicon in plants helps to increase the tolerance to zinc deficiency.

Multiplex Orthosil Technical Content

Composition

Percentage

Ortho Silicic Acid {Si(OH)2 } percent by weight minimum

2.0

Plant available Silicon (Si) equivalent, percent by weight minimum

0.6

pH 1% solution in Distilled water@ 200 C

1.7-2.2

Key features and benefits

  • Multiplex Orthosil provides resistance to nutrients and climatic stress.
  • Spray of Orthosil Reduces fungus infestation by preventing fungus from penetrating leaf surface.
  • It helps plants to resist toxicity from high levels of Phosphorus, Manganese,
    Aluminium, and Sodium.
  • It prevents insect damage by sucking insects like thrips, aphids by creating a protective layer over the leaf.

Multiplex Orthosil Usage and Crops

Crops: All crops

Dosage & Method of application: Foliar Spray

  • Dissolve 1 to 2 ml/ L of water (spray on both surfaces of leaves)
  • First spray - 30 days after sowing or transplantation. We recommend 2-3 sprays at an interval of 20 days between the sprays.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.cardtitle: MULTIPLEX PLANT AID PROFUSE ROOT ENHANCER
fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Plant Aid is a profuse root enhancer offered by Multiplex.
  • Multiplex Plant Aid has root growth hormones and hence stimulates profuse root growth
  • It helps in profuse root formation, increases root length, girth of roots and density of root hairs.

Multiplex Plant Aid Composition and Technical Details

  • Composition: Contains Indole Acetic Acid (IAA), Indole Butyric acid (IBA), Gibberellic acid (GA3) and Alpha Naphthyl Acetic acid.
  • Mode of Action: Multiplex Plant Aid works by utilizing a combination of root growth hormones to stimulate and enhance root development in plants.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Enhances faster root establishment in vegetatively propagated plants, helps in profuse root formation, increases root length, girth of roots and density of root hairs.
  • Multiplex Plant Aid Profuse Root Enhancer helps plants to over come transplanting shock, helps better anchorage of plants in the soil because of profuse rooting.
  • Helps in overcoming transplantation shock.
  • Better anchorage of plants in the soil because of profuse rooting
  • Keeps plants healthy & greener by more absorption of water and nutrients from soil
  • Induces roots in the cuttings immediately
  • Helps profuse root formation, increases root length, girth of root and density of root hairs
  • Helps in fast establishment of the Planted cuttings

Multiplex Plant Aid Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: All crops

Dosage and Method of Application

  • Root Dipping: Dissolve 1 gm of Multiplex Plant Aid in one L of water and dip the cuttings for 30 minutes before planting.
  • Nursery Beds: Dissolve 1 gm of Plant Aid in one L of water and drench the solution on the nursery bed.
  • Drip Irrigation: Dissolve 100 to 200 gm in 200 L of water and fertigate through drip for one acre.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.
