fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Fantac Plus growth promoter is an L-cysteine-based plant growth regulator, it is a combination of all essential amino acids and vitamins required for both vegetative and reproductive growth of plants.
  • Depending upon the specific requirement of the plant it supplies the essential amino acids.
  • It enhances stomatal growth & chlorophyll synthesis.
  • It increases plant resistance to extreme temperatures, high humidity, frost, pest attack, floods and drought.

Composition & Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Amino Acids and Vitamins.
  • Mode of Action: It is an amino acid-based product. They represent building blocks for several other biosynthesis pathways and play pivotal roles during signaling processes as well as in plant stress response.

Key Features and Benefits

  • It helps in both vegetative and reproductive growth.
  • Fantac Plus helps to overcome stressful conditions.
  • It helps in better flowering, fruit development and yield.
  • It promotes femaleness in dioecious flowers.
  • It ensures better fruit quality and thus ensures better prices.

Fantac Plus Usage & Crops

  • Recommended Crops: Vegetables, Cucurbits, Potato, Cash Crops, Cereals, Flowers & Horticultural Crops
  • Dosage: 100 ΓÇô 150 ml / Acre
  • Method of Application: Foliar Application.

Additional Information

  • Fantac Plus is compatible with all the insecticides and fungicides available in the market.
  • No phytotoxicity observed when used as per recommended label.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

Isabion is a natural bio-stimulant offered by Syngenta.

Isabion Syngenta is one of the purest and most concentrated products made from natural amino acids.

Isabion helps crops recover from damage caused by hail, chemicals, pests, diseases, and drought.

It is easily absorbed by plants when applied.

It contains unique Amino acids in it which have a specific role for maximizing the plantΓÇÖs yield potential.

Isabion Syngenta Technical Details

Technical Content: Isabion contains a balanced mix of short-chain peptides, long-chain peptides and free amino acids.

Key Features & Benefits

Isabion Syngenta helps in photosynthesis and action on stomas resulting in lush green crops.

It helps in pollination and fruit formation which helps in early fruit set and harvest.

It has a chelating effect which aids in easy uptake and transportation of nutrients.

It helps plants to recover from stressful conditions.

Isabion Syngenta Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: Fruit trees - Citrus, Grapes, Mango, Apple, Pomegranate and other fruits. Vegetables- Tomato, Chilli, Brinjal, Cole crops, Potato, Cucurbits, Onion and all leafy vegetables and field crops etc.

Method of Application: Foliar Spray

Dosage: 400 ml/ Acre

Additional Information

Isabion Syngenta is recommended during the active growth phases of the production cycle, in nurseries and in young plantations.

Isabion allows flexibility of usage as foliar spray.

The number of applications & timings depends on the crop, however application at the time of transplantation, flowering, fruit setting, ripening are the most important.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

Isabion Syngenta Technical Details

Technical Content: Isabion contains a balanced mix of short-chain peptides, long-chain peptides and free amino acids.

Key Features & Benefits

Isabion Syngenta helps in photosynthesis and action on stomas resulting in lush green crops.

It helps in pollination and fruit formation which helps in early fruit set and harvest.

It has a chelating effect which aids in easy uptake and transportation of nutrients.

It helps plants to recover from stressful conditions.

Isabion Syngenta Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: Fruit trees - Citrus, Grapes, Mango, Apple, Pomegranate and other fruits. Vegetables- Tomato, Chilli, Brinjal, Cole crops, Potato, Cucurbits, Onion and all leafy vegetables and field crops etc.

Method of Application: Foliar Spray

Dosage: 400 ml/ Acre

Additional Information

Isabion Syngenta is recommended during the active growth phases of the production cycle, in nurseries and in young plantations.

Isabion allows flexibility of usage as foliar spray.

The number of applications & timings depends on the crop, however application at the time of transplantation, flowering, fruit setting, ripening are the most important.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • Mulch Film and mulching paper are a revolution in the agriculture industry as it presents an economical and environment-friendly protective solution for crops and soil. So, if you are looking to make a breakthrough in your farm, the mulching film in agriculture is what you should be looking at. Mulch film not only maintains the quality of soil but also aids in the faster growth of plants. By reflecting light, it ensures control over the growth of weeds as a photosynthesis process will not be carried out.
  • Mulching film in agriculture is the next big thing ΓÇô and hereΓÇÖs how! The plastic used in the film offers great advantages by locking in moisture that further results in less water evaporation for loose and well-aerated soil, reducing the need for compaction. The mulch film is available in different thicknesses, colors, and finishes in order to fulfill the diverse requirements of client.
  • BENEFITS:
  • Limits weed growth.
  • Increase soil retention of moisture and heat.
  • Prevents soil erosion by wind and rain.
  • Modifies soil temperature.
  • Enhance soil structure by preventing soil crusting and soil compaction.
  • Improve crops yield and porosity.
  • Saves cost of labour involved in weed removal.

Machine Specifications

  • SIZE: Mulching sheet 1 Meter / 3.25 Feet x 400 Meters


Additional Information

  • COLOR: Black and Silver, Without Hole

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Planofix Bayer is a plant growth regulator, and it is an aqueous solution.
  • Planofix technical name - Alpha Napthyl Acetic Acid 4.5 SL (4.5 % w/w)
  • It helps to increase and improving the quality and yield of fruits.

Planofix Bayer Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Alpha Napthyl Acetic Acid 4.5 SL (4.5 % w/w)
  • Mode of Action: Planofix when sprayed on plants prevents the formation of abscission layer by suppressing ethylene gas produced and hence thereby prevents the shedding of flowers, buds and fruits.

Key Features and Benefits

  • Planofix Bayer used for the purpose of inducing flowering, preventing the unripe fruits.
  • It helps in enlarging fruit size, increasing and improving the quality and yield of fruits.
  • Reduces pre-harvest berry drop in grapes.
  • Planofix  Increases the resistance of plants to stress, such as drought and frost.
  • Improves the shelf life of fruits by delaying ripening.
  • Increases fruit size in pineapple and grapes.
  • Pineapple: to induce flowering and uniform growth, to increase fruit size & to delay maturity

Planofix Bayer Usage and Crops

  • Recommended Crops: Pineapple, Tomato, Chilli, Mango, Grapes etc.
  • Dosage: 44.4ml in 200 liters of water (10 ppm) & 88.8ml in 400 liters of water (100 ppm)
  • Method of Application: Foliar Application

Pineapple:

  • Apply just before expected flowering.
  • Drench the whole fruit but avoid the spray drift to young crop.
  • Again, wet the whole fruit 2 weeks before harvest.

Tomato: At the time of flowering apply twice.
Chillies:

  • First spray during flowering.
  • Second spray 20-30 days after spray (2 applications).

Mango:

  • First spray when tender fruits are of pea size.
  • Malformation before fruit bud differentiation- approximate 3 months before flowering.

Grapes:

  • First spray at pruning
  • Second spray when flowering starts.

(To control berry, drop in grapes, Spray on matured grapes branches 10-15 days before harvesting)

Additional Information

  • Should be sprayed during cool part of the day.
  • Prevents natural shedding of squares, bolls in cotton, flowers in vegetables, chilies, and fruits like mango.
  • Though compatible with most pesticides, individual application will give good result.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

 

About Product

  • Progibb Easy Gibberellic Acid is a plant growth regulator, containing gibberellic acid (GA3).
  • Progibb Easy Gibberellic Acid (GA3) is a substance naturally occurring in plants.
  • The application of GA3 across numerous agricultural products is instrumental in boosting their yield, quality, and overall market value.

Progibb Easy Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Gibberellic acid

Key Features and Benefits

  • Progibb Easy is a highly effective growth promoter that increases the size and quality of fruits, vegetables, and other crops.
  • Progibb Easy Gibberellic Acid plays a crucial role in optimum growth and development.
  • Used in many crops to improve crop yield, quality, and value.
  • Progibb Easy Gibberellic Acid enhances fruit quality by improving cluster stretching, cluster thinning, and berry sizing in table grapes.
  • Increases fruit set, reduces fruit drop, delays fruit maturity, and minimizes rind creasing in citrus.

Progibb Easy Usage and Crops

  • Recommended Crops: Banana, Cherries. Citrus, Pineapple, Sugar Cane, Table Grapes, vegetables, and other crops
  • Dosage: 1 to 2 gm per 100 L of water
  • Method of Application: Foliage Spraying

 

Additional Information

  • For nearly 40 years, Progibb Easy has been the plant growth regulator of choice for fruit growers around the world and it is the most concentrated formulation on the market

 

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

Product Name:- Garden Shade Net 50% Shade Net

Product Description

  • REMIUM MATERIAL : Anil Packaging shade Net is made of 100% UV stabilized high-density polyethylene (HDPE), different from ordinary plant cover nets. It is anti-aging, applicable for greenhouses, livestock housing, poultry buildings, hoop structures, farm buildings, animal shelters, and more.
  • UV PROTETION : Our Shade Net blocks up to 70% of the sun, is mesh and breathable, works great for keeping the heat out from the sun on parks outdoor areas deck or protecting your plants from the over the sun, overheating in greenhouses.
  • MORE FUNCTION : Lightweight and Durable Plant Shade Netting cover can be used to protect your plants from the over sun over heating, prevent frost damage on plants in winter, and keep plants away from insects, construction building, create a comfortable shaded area. This net will cut out harsh sunlight, dust, UV Rays and make a much cooler area for you, your family, pets, or your garden.
  • DIFFERENT FROM OTHER : Anil Packaging Shade Net are lighter, smaller in volume, easy to use the store, and have a much longer lifetime.

Machine Specifications

  • Shade Percent : 50%, Quality: 70 GSM

Product Description

MIPATEX HDPE Tarpaulinscome from 80 to 420 GSM, different sizes and different color like blue, black, green, milky white and yellow. Made up of 100% virgin raw material, UV Stabilized and recyclable material. These products are tear resistant, water resistant, durable, flexible, reinforced with aluminum eyelets and ropes on all sides and last long for so many years. Available in both rolls and sheets.



SPECIFICATIONS

Material

Plastic

Size

12Ft X 18Ft

Colour

Black

Brand

MIPATEX

Water Resistance Level

Waterproof

Fabric Weight

150 Grams per Square Meter

FEATURES

EXTRA THICK & STRONG:Made up of 100% virgin raw material, UV Stabilized, tear-resistant, 100% water-resistant, durable, flexible, and last long for so many years.

WATERPROOF:Tarps can be used to shelter boats, cars, campers, or motor-vehicles from the elements (i.e. wind, rain, or sunlight), as an emergency roof patch material for homeowners, and as a temporary pickup truck bed cover.

TIE IT DOWN EASILY: Aluminium Eyelets spaced every 3 feet and at each corner allow this poly tarp to be tied down and secured simply. Create a "tent" for camping, fairs, and more!

MULTIPURPOSE USE: Cover and protect your Vehicle or wood and building materials at construction sites; keep floors clean using this is a drop sheet when painting or polishing - the uses are endless.

THE BEST AROUND:Made from polyethylene, this material is made to last. Don't get tired of replacing torn, worn-out plastic tarps, use one that offers the best protection and is designed to last.

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • TUFFPAULIN tarpaulin are made from superior quality polyethylene weave which provides durability with heavy duty thickness.
  • The tarpaulin is designed with stitch-less welded seams, Multi Layered Cross Laminated (MLCL), six-layer technology, metal reinforced grommets (eyelets) and unique design resists tears, rip or abrasion.
  • TUFFPAULIN tirpal not only are waterproof, they are also mildew-proof, washable and feature heat-sealed seams. Our tarpaulins are 100% recyclable and will last five times longer than ordinary tarp. From the construction site to the farm, our heavy-duty tarps are used for protective and waterproof temporary shelters in disaster zones, repair for roofs and walls, pitch a tent, sports field covers, hammock, creating a shower area, covering all types of equipment, goods and cargo, covering boats and bike, cars or motor vehicles and firewood cover. Ideal for light, large or heavy scale construction, building material cover, agricultural, home and commercial gardening, recreational camping and hospitals & health centers.
  • Tarps are used for temporary shelter, emergency remediation, emergency roof patch material, temporary truck bed cover, emergency blanket, ground cover, protect storage, or drop sheet.
  • They can also be used to provide shelter from storm damage, resists from UV, high air, winds, airborne objects, rain, sun or sunlight. No matter what the usage, emergency or application is, TUFFPAULINΓÇÖs tarp provides longevity for all covering or protective needs. They are budget friendly, easy to handle, lightweight, simple in Installation and require minimal maintenance.

Machine Specifications

  • Actual size will be approx. half foot shorter due to eyelets
  • 6 Layers Laminated Structure ΓÇô Unlike the traditional woven tarp which is a 3 layered product, Tuffpaulin tarpaulin is a 6 layered cross laminated multi-layered structure that is up-to 5X longer lasting and is completely seamless.
  • Waterproof ΓÇô Tuffpaulin Tarps are stitch less and have heat sealed corners and edges. Rain or shine, snow or wind this heavy tarp can handle it well. It is UV resistant, waterproof and weather proof, and can withstand storms and the elements outdoors.
  • UV Resistant ΓÇô Sunlight canΓÇÖt harm Tuffpaulin tarpaulin. It is fortified with UV resistant additives that increase the life when in the exposure of sunlight
  • Dual protection built-in Grommets ΓÇô The automatically welded metal gromets combined with ultrasonic plastic gromets on corners and after every approx. 3 feet for allow easy tie-downs.
  • The Best Around ΓÇô Made from 6 layered cross laminated films, this material is made to last longer than ordinary tarps. Don't get tired of replacing torn, worn-out plastic tarps, use one that offers the best protection and is designed to last.

  • Uses - Can be used as weather and yard equipment cover. In outdoor it can be used for protection sheet for tent, pool, sandbox, boats, wood, bikes, dump bins, cars or motor vehicles. Providing camping shelter from the wind, rain or sunlight for campers. As roof for shade or emergency roof patch material, truck bed cover, debris removal drawstring tarp. It is portable, washable, durable and reusable.

fields.cardtitle: Tapas Fruit Fly Trap & Lure- Ipm Combo
fields.Description:
Product Description

  • IPM Fruit fly traps & Lures is designed for different fruit fly species in vegetable and fruit crops. Pheromone traps have played a large role in detecting influxes of adult pest species from one region to another and also even from non-crop areas into crop areas. Pheromones and traps can be used to monitor target pests in agriculture areas.
  • The best reason to use FRUIT FLY LURE pheromone lures and traps is to monitor and control fruit fly pest population trends in Mango, Guava, Sapota, Citrus, Banana, Papaya which prefers young, green, and tender fruits for egg laying. FRUIT FLY LURE reduces the cost and burden of unnecessary spraying of pesticides, which in return reduces our environment from contaminating.

Technical Content

  • NA

Features & Benefits

FEATURES

  • Pheromone used 99% pure.
  • 100% Effective from other commercial product.
  • Wooden lure size is (10 mm * 17 mm * 35 mm) in center one whole for hanging option.
  • Lure working for 60 days an active with 100% catches.
  • Lure attracts to fly 1.8km and in farm 150 meter riddance.
  • Lure can stay for one year without removing from packing. Lure packing in silver anti smell realizing pouch, with inside aluminum coated for gerent.
  • Reduce the use of harmful pesticide and do organic farming and save the life.
  • Upside on trap is one hole for passing the wire from hole and hanging in to farm.
  • The trap is made with a transparent body for checking the numbers of the insect in the trap.
  • On transparent body the whole for insect entering which is attract to smell.
  • In yellow bottom use same liquid for insect attract, a second thing is yellow color attract same species insect.


BENEFITS

  • Economically Affordable, easy to install and manage.
  • If used properly can detect low numbers of insects.
  • Collect only Species Specific
  • Non toxic.
  • Can be used all season long.
  • Pheromone Lure is species-specific.
  • Reduce the use of harmful pesticide and do organic farming and save the life.

Usage

CROPS

  • Gherkins, Cucumber, Mango, Pumpkins, Musk melon, Watermelon, Guava, Sapota, Citrus, Banana, Papaya, Bottle gourd, Bitter gourd, sweet gourd, Snake gourd, Ridge gourd, pointed gourd, Sponge gourd. all vegetables.


INSECTS/ DISEASE

  • Bactrocera correcta ( Guava Fruit Fly),
  • Bactrocera zonata ( Peach fruit Fly),
  • Bactrocera dorsalisa ( Oriental fruit fly)
  • Bactrocera cucurbitae (Melon fruit fly),


MODE OF ACTION

  • NA


DOSAGE

  • IPM / Maxplus trap with Fruit fly lure at 15/ ha for controlling.


Additional Information

  • Please use hand gloves / Keep clean hand for handling lure
  • Suitable Trap for Fruit fly Lure: IPM Trap or Maxplus Trap

fields.cardtitle: Sk Agrotech Yellow Sticky Insect Trap 6 X 8 Inch
fields.Description:
Product Description

  • The SK Agrotech Yellow Traps are designed to effectively manage and control flying insects in gardens and farms. This pack includes a combination of yellow and blue glue pads that attract and capture a wide range of harmful flying insects, including whiteflies, thrips, aphids, and other pests. Ideal for both residential and commercial use, these traps help protect your plants and crops from pest damage.

Features & Benefits

FEATURES

  • Dual Attraction: Yellow traps are effective for attracting whiteflies, aphids, and thrips, while blue traps target specific pests that are attracted to blue light.
  • High-Quality Adhesive: Strong, long-lasting adhesive ensures effective capture and reduces pest populations.
  • Durable: Made from weather-resistant materials suitable for various environmental conditions.
  • Eco-Friendly: Non-toxic and safe for use around plants and crops, promoting sustainable pest management.
  • Easy to Use: Simple to place and replace, with no special equipment needed.


BENEFITS

  • Effective Pest Control: Attracts and captures a broad spectrum of harmful flying insects, helping to manage and reduce pest populations.
  • Improved Plant Health: Protects plants and crops from damage caused by flying insects, leading to healthier growth and higher yields.
  • Reduced Chemical Use: Offers a natural, chemical-free alternative to pesticides, promoting a safer environment.
  • Cost-Effective: Provides a reliable pest control solution with minimal ongoing costs.

Usage

CROPS

  • Recommended Uses:
  • Gardens
  • Farms
  • Greenhouses
  • Orchards
  • Home Yards


INSECTS/ DISEASE

  • Whiteflies, Thrips, Aphids, and other flying insects.


MODE OF ACTION

  • How to Use:
  • Setup: Remove the protective cover from the adhesive surface of the traps.
  • Placement: Position the yellow and blue traps in areas where flying insects are commonly observed or where signs of infestation are evident. Place them near plants or crops for optimal effectiveness.
  • Monitoring: Regularly check the traps for captured insects and replace the traps when the adhesive is full or when they lose effectiveness.
  • Maintenance: Dispose of used traps and replace with new ones as needed. Ensure traps are kept clean and free from debris for maximum performance.

Hectare Mango Picker is a tool for harvesting of mango and other fruits. This product comes with especially handmade cotton net to absorb sap while picking fruits. Mango Picker with cotton net and 4 replaceable sharp paper blade

FEATURES:

  • Use and throw blades: We are providing 4 extra blades. These are very sharp paper blades, easily available at any hardware shop.
  • Cotton Net: It have especially handmade cotton net design to hold more number of mangoes. Cotton tread absorb sap oozed out while picking.

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • The heavy duty coconut tree climber is manually operated machine which can withstand up to 500 kg capacity. It is mainly used in Agriculture and Farming.
  • We can use this machine to climb Coconut trees , Palm trees & Palmyra trees.
  • The main advantage of Tree climber is which can be used for the trees of different girth, this is possible by simply changing the wire rope.
  • It features a Double wire rope method for Fast & Hassle free operation and also it comes with adjustable foot rest belt to suit men and women.
  • It is specially designed for skilled & unskilled climbers ( Semi Skilled ) who wants to climb the trees.

Features & Benefits

  • Manually used.
  • 500KG weight capacity.
  • Standard grade material.
  • 100% safe.
  • 360 degree rotation.
  • Easy to handle.
  • Gender friendly.
  • Tested and approved product.

Machine Specifications

  • Material used: polish bar with powder coated.
  • Rubber and regular rope.
  • weight: 11.8 Kg


Additional Information

  • The ladder has two parts meant for the (L) left and (R) right legs. First of all the semi-circular bond of rubber cross is fitted round the trunk along with the wire rope and after interlocking. It is locked into the hook of the pedal. This will have a very secured grip of the left leg
  • climber on the trunk. Now repeat the same procedure as above for the right leg ladder at a distance of 8 to 10 inches between the right and the left. Now insert your foot into the right pedal and the left leg into your left pedal. This would mean that your left and the right ladders are ready to climb on. After this make use of the safety belt, that is exactly like our waist belt. Rotate the D shaped part to your front and fix the crane type hook of the safety belt to the ladder with the right hand to the side of right handle. First put pressure on the left leg and raise the right pedal (above 10 to 12 inches difference between both) Next put your pressure on the right pedal and raise the left pedal high up. (The pedal that bears weight is fully secured and its grip is very tight) In the similar pattern climb to the top. Once you reach the top, fix the crane type hook passing it once circular & look it at D type hook. The coconut plucking will be highly secured with both your hands free to do any sort of work like plucking coconuts, cleaning the tree etc. You could sit or stand fully secured on the tree without any fear. While getting down loosen the left pedal and by taking a little distance (10ΓÇ¥ to 12ΓÇ¥) put a little pressure. This will secure the grip on it. Follow the similar procedure on the right pedal in the same you will easily descend down to the ground.
  • Advantage: This equipment is fully secured. 2) The climber feels secured comfortable in any season.
  • Instructions : Before using the coconut plucking ladder practice climbing it 5 to 6 times at a height of 8 to 10 feet from the ground.

fields.cardtitle: ROYAL KISSAN ADJUSTABLE AGRICULTURAL HAND OPERATED MANUAL SEEDER-RK012
fields.Description:
Product Description

  • Royal Kissan Adjustable Agricultural Hand Operated Manual Seeder
  • Royal Kissan Adjustable Agricultural Hand Operated Manual Seeder is an innovative and efficient tool designed to simplify and optimize the process of seed sowing in agricultural fields. With a compact and user-friendly design, this manual seeder is ideal for small-scale farming operations, gardening enthusiasts, and even agricultural research purposes.
  • One of the key features of the Royal Kissan Manual Seeder is its adjustable settings, allowing farmers to control the spacing between seeds and the depth of planting. This level of customization enables precise and uniform distribution of seeds, minimizing wastage and ensuring optimal growth conditions for the crops. By eliminating the need for manual seed sowing, this tool significantly reduces the labor and time required, leading to increased productivity and efficiency on the farm.
  • The Royal Kissan Manual Seeder is constructed using high-quality materials, ensuring durability and longevity. It can withstand the rigors of regular use and is resistant to harsh weather conditions. The seeder's simple design also makes it easy to clean and maintain, further adding to its convenience
  • Hand Operated Seed Drill Function
  • Planting Suitable Seeds : Corn, Maize, Soyabean, Peanut, Chickpea, Cotton, Sunflower Seed etc Seed Topography : Plain, mountainous land, hill, etc.

Features & Benefits

  • Hole Seeding Rate : 1-2
  • adjustable Seeding Depth : 1Inch/2Inch
  • Seed Space : 5/6/7/7.5/9/11 Inch (adjustable)
  • Mouth Number : 6/7/8/9/10/12 (adjustable)
  • Seed Plate : 12 Set
  • Extra Springs : 10 Nos
  • Seed Capacity : 3-4 kg

Machine Specifications

  • MODEL NAME: RK012
  • Suitable For: Corn, Maize, Soyabean, Peanut, Chickpea, Cotton, Sunflower Seed etc
  • Weight: 11 Kg
  • Type of Product: Hand Operated Seed Drill
  • Material: Plastic
  • Capacity: Seed: 3-4 kg
  • Surface Finish Type: Orange
  • Function: Planting
  • Depth: Seeding Depth 1/2 Inch
  • Category: Hand Cultivator

With a compact and user-friendly design, this manual seeder is ideal for small-scale farming operations, gardening enthusiasts, and even agricultural research purposes.
  • One of the key features of the Royal Kissan Manual Seeder is its adjustable settings, allowing farmers to control the spacing between seeds and the depth of planting. This level of customization enables precise and uniform distribution of seeds, minimizing wastage and ensuring optimal growth conditions for the crops. By eliminating the need for manual seed sowing, this tool significantly reduces the labor and time required, leading to increased productivity and efficiency on the farm.
  • The Royal Kissan Manual Seeder is constructed using high-quality materials, ensuring durability and longevity. It can withstand the rigors of regular use and is resistant to harsh weather conditions. The seeder's simple design also makes it easy to clean and maintain, further adding to its convenience
  • Hand Operated Seed Drill Function
  • Planting Suitable Seeds : Corn, Maize, Soyabean, Peanut, Chickpea, Cotton, Sunflower Seed etc Seed Topography : Plain, mountainous land, hill, etc.

Features & Benefits

  • The auger drill bit is a manual design, different from the battery-driven auger and gasoline auger, which is safe, environmentally friendly, smoke-free, and quieter. Drilling directly into the ground saves you time and effort by eliminating the need to bend over while drilling constantly. Moreover, it is 42 inches long (3.5 feet) and 4 inches in width. Hand post hole digger is made of high-quality carbon steel, with a black glossy coating, not easy to rust, break or twist, thick and sturdy, and can be used for a long time.

fields.cardtitle: BALWAAN BE-63 EARTH AUGER WITH 8" AND 12" BIT FREE
fields.Description:
Product Description

  • The Balwaan earth auger BE-63 is used to dig holes in the soil for planting, construction, and other purposes. It is recommended for all types of land, soft, medium, and hard, & Continuously can be used for six to eight hours.It is suitable for drilling-type operations on grounds, farms, nurseries, and greenhouses. In agriculture, they are used to drill for banana plantations and vegetable crops.Other uses include Agriculture Institutes, Horticulture Plantations, Highway authorities, Contractors for fencing, soil sampling, etc. It takes less time and effort to dig the soil with this machine. Powerful 63cc 2-stroke petrol engine powers this machine. There are different sizes of bits that can be fitted to this machine in order to dig holes of different depths. A Balwaan earth auger can dig holes as deep as 3-4 feet and as wide as 1 foot and can dig around 70-80 holes/ liter of petrol on 70% human efficiency.

Machine Specifications

  • Model: BE-63
  • Brand: Balwaan
  • Engine Type: Single Cylinder, 2-stroke
  • Cooling Type: Air-cooled
  • Fuel Used: Petrol
  • Displacement: 63 cc
  • Power: 1.7Kw (3HP)
  • Max Engine RPM; 9000 RPM
  • Fuel Oil Mixture: 40 ml in 1 litre of Petrol
  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 1.7L
  • Fuel Consumption: 1 Liters/Hour on 70% capacity
  • Weight: 14 Kg
  • Working Width: 10cm(4 inch),15cm(6 inch),20cm(8 inch),25cm(10 inch), 30cm(12 inch)
  • Working Depth: 3-4 feet
  • Auger Bit RPM: Upto 290

A Balwaan earth auger can dig holes as deep as 3-4 feet and as wide as 1 foot and can dig around 70-80 holes/ liter of petrol on 70% human efficiency.

Machine Specifications

  • Model: BE-63
  • Brand: Balwaan
  • Engine Type: Single Cylinder, 2-stroke
  • Cooling Type: Air-cooled
  • Fuel Used: Petrol
  • Displacement: 63 cc
  • Power: 1.7Kw (3HP)
  • Max Engine RPM; 9000 RPM
  • Fuel Oil Mixture: 40 ml in 1 litre of Petrol
  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 1.7L
  • Fuel Consumption: 1 Liters/Hour on 70% capacity
  • Weight: 14 Kg
  • Working Width: 10cm(4 inch),15cm(6 inch),20cm(8 inch),25cm(10 inch), 30cm(12 inch)
  • Working Depth: 3-4 feet
  • Auger Bit RPM: Upto 290

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • Solar Dryer is an environmental friendly dryer which can be used for drying various types of Seeds and Sea foods.
  • Proper Dust proof, Insect proof and Waterproof construction for hygiene drying of all types of farm produce.
  • Features:
  • Environment Friendly.
  • Durable.
  • Proper Fan control switch and fan regulating circuit for moisture Removal.
  • Top Cover UV filter solid Poly Carbonate Sheet Unbreakable.
  • Castor Wheel For Easy Movement.
  • Dust proof, insect proof, waterproof, well-engineered construction with Long life up to 20
  • years, higher efficiency due to 3 modes of heat transfer.
  • Can dry anything using power of sun keeping taste, flavor, aroma, color, and all nutrients intact
  • just removes the extra water content for storing long self-life.

Machine Specifications

  • Product Type : Solar Dryer
  • Brand : Made In India
  • Power : 3 Watt (Solar Panel)
  • Material : Aluminum
  • Machine Capacity : 2.5 Kg (Approx.)
  • Number Of Tray : 1
  • Tray Size (LxB) : 16 x 32 Inches
  • Tray Capacity : 3-4 Kg
  • Tray Material : Aluminum
  • Chimney Height : 2 Feet
  • Machine Dimensions (LxBxH) : 102x59x16
  • Weight : 12 Kg (Approx)
  • Size: 920 L X 445 W X 90 H,
  • 1 no 16 x 32 inch food grade alluminium perforated tray,
  • 1 no 2-inch fan for moisture removal 0.5watt, 1 no 3watt
  • 6 Volt solar panel for fan circulation, 4 nos castor wheels for easy movement, Double UV Solid Poly carbonate Sheet for Heat trapping, Food Grade High Strength Alluminium Powder coated Body made with CNC laser cutting and CNC bending, average loading capacity 2.5 kg per day, temperature range 50 to 80 deg Celsius.


Additional Information

  • Accessories included:
  • Dryer cabinet body 1 no, Solid metal Drying tray 1 no, castor wheels 4 nos, Hand Gloves 1 pair, Solar panel 1 no, Spanner 1 no, fan 1 no. extra piping and pipe fittings

fields.cardtitle: Tapas Pahalwaan 101 Single Motor Battery Sprayer 12X8
fields.Description:
Product Description

  • This sprayer has multiple applications and is widely used in agriculture, horticulture, sericulture, plantations, forestry, gardens, institutions, universities, etc.
  • Suitable for spraying weedicides, Insecticides, and water-soluble medicines on crops, sanitizing infected objects, etc.
  • It comes with a high tank capacity of 20 liters and four nozzles that displays different spraying volume when attached to it.
  • Equipped with a High Performance and long-lasting 12Vx8A Dry Acid battery.
  • The charging time of this Battery Sprayer is just 3 Hours and one can easily spray 15-20 tanks of liquid volume within a single charge.
  • No manual efforts are required to create pressure.
  • Easily Perform Continuous & Mist spray in 10 feet radius range.

Features & Benefits

  • Top-selling Battery Sprayer in India.
  • User-friendly operation.
  • Spraying can be done by pressing a single button.
  • Fitted with a regulator for controlling the pressure.
  • Equipped with a Long-lasting and HI-performance Dry lead battery.
  • Fitted with backrest and shoulder pad for comfortable spraying.
  • 6 Months Warranty.
  • Accessories and Spare parts available all over India.

fields.Description:
Product Description

Key Points for Nutrifeed Forage

  • High Biomass Yield(50 % more than SSG products), Suitable for Multi-cutting.
  • Drought tolerant once established.
  • No risk of prussic acid poisoning and is suitable for early feeding.
  • High Protein and Nutrient Value(12-16% crude protein).
  • High palatability.
  • IVMD 61.3%
  • High metabolizable energy.
  • Nutrifeed is tolerant to most pests and diseases and requires almost negligible investment for their control.
  • Nutrifeed gives disease and pest free green forage for better health of animals.
  • High digestibility renders less feed quantity per animal and less forage is for cultivation.
  • High nutritional fodder helps in the better health of the animal.

Seed rate: 3 kg per care

==================================

Agronomy & Management

Soil:

Fodder crops can be grown well on a wide range of soil types Soil pH should be 5.5 to 7.0, and Avoid acidic and saline soils. Drained soils yield well.

Water & Irrigation:

Nutrifeed is tolerant to drought but should irrigate before 7 days intervals in summer and 12 days intervals in the rainy season. For better palatability crop should be with high moisture. Sufficient irrigation will boost the healthy and expected bio-mass yield in forage crops.

Sowings:

Although Nutrifeed is comparatively easy to establish, prepare a good seedbed for good germination and root development. Where irrigation is available, the better establishment will be obtained by pre-watering and sowing into moisture, rather than watering after sowing. Sowing depth 3cm to 5 cm with soil covering for compaction Row to Row Spacing is 30 cm and Plant to Plant is 25 cm

Sowing Type:

Ridges & Furrows:

For staggered sowing, harvesting, irrigation and fertigation ridges and furrows method is very successful to get high yield and high-quality fodder.

Blocks Method:

The blocks method is another successful method in forage cultivation. Farmer can harvest the fodder as per in requirement and irrigate the same block.

Sowing Time:

Spring - Feb to April

Kharif - May to August

Rabi (Central India and South India only) - September to October

Seed Rate:

2 to 3 Kg per Acre

Spacing:

Nutrifeed spacing is row to row 30 cm X plant to plant 25 cm

Cutting & Harvesting:

Nutrifeed can cut and feed at any time but 1 meter to 1.2 meters is idle height to get more benefits from green fodder in terms of nutritive values. Nutrifeed should be cut 6 to 8 inches above ground level when harvesting to promote faster re-growth for multi-cut.

Post Cutting Activities:

Apply adequate nitrogen and water for the regeneration of fresh leaves and Stems.

More Info

Fertilizer:

Fertilizer should use according to the soil test results.

N-30 Kg (60 Kg Urea),

P-25 Kg (45 Kg DAP or 120 kg SSP),

K-10 Kg (20 Kg Potash) per Acre is recommended for Nutrifeed.

Adequate nitrogen will ensure the crop's fast growth and quick recovery after cutting. Apply Nitrogen as a top dressing to get optimum benefit.

Weed Control

Weeds in Nutrifeed can be easily controlled by spraying 1 Kg Atrazine 50% WP per 1 acre.

Insect & Disease Management

From past experience, No pests and diseases have been observed. Please follow the guidelines of the company executive for control measures.

N-30 Kg (60 Kg Urea),

P-25 Kg (45 Kg DAP or 120 kg SSP),

K-10 Kg (20 Kg Potash) per Acre is recommended for Nutrifeed.

Adequate nitrogen will ensure the crop's fast growth and quick recovery after cutting. Apply Nitrogen as a top dressing to get optimum benefit.

Weed Control

Weeds in Nutrifeed can be easily controlled by spraying 1 Kg Atrazine 50% WP per 1 acre.

Insect & Disease Management

From past experience, No pests and diseases have been observed. Please follow the guidelines of the company executive for control measures.

fields.Description:
Product Description

Key Features

  • Saaho Tomato Seeds is a high-yielding determinate tomato hybrid developed by Syngenta.
  • It is known for its excellent fruit quality and high fruit firmness.
  • The plant has good stay greenness and dark green foliage.
  • Saaho Tomato Seeds is having good heat set.

Saaho Tomato Seeds Characteristics

  • Fruit Color: Ripe fruits are attractive red & glossy
  • Fruit Shape: Flat Round type, uniform green
  • Fruit Weight: 80-100gms
  • Average Yield: 25-40 MT/acre (depending on season and cultural practice)

Sowing Details

  • Sowing Season & Recommended States:

Season

States

Kharif

MH, MP, GJ, TN, KA, AP, TS, RJ, UP, UK, HR, PB, WB, CH, OD, BH, JH, AS, HP, NE

Rabi

MH, MP, GJ, TN, KA, AP, TS, RJ, UP, UK, HR, PB, WB, CH, OD, BH, JH, AS, HP, NE

Summer

MH, MP, GJ, TN, KA, AP, TS, RJ, UP, UK, HR, PB, WB, CH, OD, BH, JH, AS, HP, NE
  • Seed Rate: 40-50 gm per acre.
  • Time of Transplanting: Transplanting should be done at 21-25 days after sowing.
  • Spacing: Row to Row and Plant to Plant - 120 x 60cm
  • First Harvest: Harvest the fruit at the time of physiological maturity. It starts maturing by 65 -70 days after transplanting- depending on season/climate. Picking is done generally at an interval of 4-5 days. Depending on the type of market/distance -tomatoes are picked

Additional Information

  • During Summer Saaho Tomato Seeds requires frequent irrigation. Winter- As against the summer season, in winter the irrigation frequency is longer. Rainy - very less frequency depending upon soil moisture
  • Total N:P:K requirement for Saaho Tomato is 100:150:150 kg per acre.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow to the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • Paecilomyces lilacinus is an eco-friendly biological nematicide and is highly effective in controlling Nematodes

Technical Content

  • CFU: 2 X 10^8 per ml

Features & Benefits

Usage

CROPS

  • Coffee, tea, Arecanut, Cotton, Groundnut, Wheat, Maize, Rice, Soybean, pulses, cucumber, capsicum, Onion, Garlic, Potato, chilies, tomato, Brinjal, Cabbage, Cauliflower, Peas, sugarcane, Grapes, Mango, citrus, Apple, Banana, pomegranate, strawberry, tea, coffee, cardamom, pepper, Nursery plantations, and Horticultural crops.


INSECTS/ DISEASE

  • Target Insect: Root - knot nematode, Ramiform nematode, Cyst nematode, Golden cyst nematode, Citrus nematode and Lesion nematode


MODE OF ACTION

  • Mode of Action Conidial penetration: Paecilomyces lilacinus on getting attached to the host forms a dense mycelium that gives rise to conidiophores. These bear phialides at the ends of which spores are formed in long chains. The fungus produces an appressorium (a swelling on the end of the germ tube) which marks the start of the invasion of insects. The appressorium produces a penetration peg that enters the host's external skein (cuticle). The fungus produces hyphae inside the insect body which proliferate and start feeding on the insectΓÇÖs internal contents.


DOSAGE

  • Dose: Mix Paecilomyces lilacinus at the proportion of 2-3 ml per liter of water/ seed treatments/ drip irrigation / FYM. Individual Plants 2 ml / 2 grams/liter of water & apply directly into the soil.

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • Trichoderma viride is a bio fungicide that protects plants from soil-borne and seed-borne pathogens

Technical Content

  • CFU: 2 X 10^8 per ml

Features & Benefits

Usage

CROPS

  • Cereals, Pulses, Oil seeds, Cotton, Capsicum, Chilies, Cauliflower, Brinjal, Tomato, Potato, Onion, Peas, Beans, Ginger, Turmeric, Cardamom, Tea, Coffee, and Fruits crops- Apple, Citrus, Grape, Pomegranate, Banana etc.


MODE OF ACTION

  • Trichoderma Viride controls disease-causing pathogens such as pythium Fusarium sp. Botrytis cinerea and sclerotinia homeomorph cause root rot, root wilt, seedling rot, and collar rot disease in crops.


DOSAGE

  • Dose: Seed Treatment: 10 ml per kg of seed. 1-2 liter/acre Foliar Spray: 2.5-5 ml/liter Target crops: Can use in all crops.

fields.Description:
Product Description

ABOUT PRODUCT

  • Eco neem plus is a Neem based biopesticide with a blend of 10,000 ppm Azadirachtin and Neem oil, providing all the liminoids for an effective insecticidal action.
  • Econeem Plus has multiple modes of action Like, Repellent, Antifeedant, Insect growth retardant and inhibits egg laying and hatching. Product has systemic activity resulting in good translaminar action.

Technical Content

  • Azadiractin 10000 PPM

Usage

Crops and pest

  • Fruit borer in Tomato
  • Fruit & shoot borer in Brinjal

Recommended Dosage

  • 1000-1500 ml per hectare
  • Dilution ΓÇô 3 ml\litre of water
  • Apply as a prophylactic and\or at early stage of insect attack.
  • Ensure complete coverage of canopy
  • Repeat spray at 7-10 days of interval based on the pest load

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • EBS All Expert Is a New Unique Combination of 3 Bio Pesticides Verticillium Lecanii + Beauveria Bassiana + Metarhizium Anisopliae That Occur Naturally in Soils Throughout the World ΓÇô The Combination Gives Excellent Bio ΓÇô Insecticide Control

Technical Content

  • CFU: 2 X 10^8 per ml

Features & Benefits

Usage

CROPS

  • Field crops: Cotton, Paddy, Sorghum, Sunflower, Groundnut, Potato, Mustard etc.
  • Vegetable crops: Brinjal, Bhendi, Tomato, Chillies, etc


INSECTS/ DISEASE

  • Target Insect: Aphids, Jassids, white flies, Thrips, Aphids, Mites, leafhoppers, and mealybugs for various crops.


MODE OF ACTION

  • EBS All Expert is a bioinsecticide containing the white muscardine fungus Beauveria bassiana and the white halo fungus Verticillium lecanii in equal proportion. It can be used for the management of lepidopterous larvae, beetle grubs, grasshopper thrips, whiteflies, aphids, soft-bodied scale insects, and mealy bugs.
  •  


DOSAGE

  • Dose: Soil Application ΓÇô 1-1.5 liter per hectare; Foliar application ΓÇô 1-2 ml per liter of water

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • ABAMECTIN 1.9 % IN EMULSIFIABLE CONCENTRATE FORMULATION

 Technical Details

  • ABAMECTIN 1.9%

Features & Benefits

  • Abamectin 1.9% EC is a broad-spectrum insecticide and acaricide that's used to control a variety of insects, ticks, and mites.

Benefits

  • It is a broad-spectrum Miticide and Insecticide
  • It has strong translaminar activity with contact and stomach action, therefore giving the best control.
  • It is a product of natural origin, hence itΓÇÖs very safe for mammals.
  • Control phytophagous mites and insect pests on a variety of agricultural and horticultural crops.

Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: It is used for vegetable, soybean, maize, pea, green gram, cabbage, gram, leafy vegetable, tuber vegetable, fruits, cotton, cereals, pulses and all type of crops.

Mode of Action:

Abamectin 1.9% EC is a nerve poison that works by disrupting the nervous system of pests. It binds to chloride channels in the pests' nerve cells, which causes paralysis and death.

Dosage

  • 15-25 ml/pump.
  • 150-250 ml/ Acre.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.cardtitle: ALBATA ROYAL CLEAR MITE BIO INSECTICIDE (PLANT EXTRACT)
fields.Description:
Product Description

ABOUT PRODUCT

  • Royal Clear Mite is 100% Plant derived solution, Non-Hazardous and biodegradable solution, disrupts breathing of Spider mites, Prevents Spider mites laid eggs from hatching. Applicable on the leaves as a foliar spray, kills on contact or ingestion, fast acting. Royal Clear Mite (ALBATA) NOCA, SATTVIK and KRUSHI Certified, Non-Toxic, Eco friendly.

Technical Content

∩é╖  100% derived from plant extracts

Features & Benefits

FEATURES

  • Sustainable and Chemical free Agriculture product .
  • Non-Hazardous and biodegradable solution.
  • Prevents Spider mites laid eggs from hatching.

Usage

  • CROPS -

Target Pests:Smell Free Agricultural and Domestic use for Control of Spider Mites, Aphids, Red Spider Mites, Two-Spotted Mites, Thrips in plants, Mosquito Larva, Southern Red Mites, Spruce Mites, Slugs, Chiggers, European Red Mites, white flies, thunder flies, greenflies, blackflies.

Target Crops:Can be used on any plant that has a mite infestation. Cucurbits, Tomatoes, Grass/Lawns, Squash, Grapes. Pumpkins, trees. Roses, Cucumbers, Zucchini, Wheat, Peonies.

  • INSECTS/ DISEASES - Collar Rot, Damping Off, Root Rot, Wilts, Black Leg, Tip Burn, Black Spot
  • MODE OF ACTION -
  • Contact and systematic action.
  • One of the A.I passes Inter cellularly into the xylem vessels & it is swept along by the sap stream towards the shoot apex acropetally.
  • DOSAGE -
  • Dilute 2ml of Royal Clear Mite with 1 litre of water.
  • The dilution ratio depends on the frequency of application. 1:750 is ideal for 1-2 times use every month and 1:500 is best recommended for every 3 to 5 days use and heavy infestation.
  • ADDITIONAL INFORMATION-

DIRECTIONS FOR MIXING AND HANDLING ΓÇôINSTRUCTIONS

  • Mix the required amount of Royal Clear Mite in water with sufficient agitation to maintain a uniform suspension in the spray or mixing tank.
  • Tank should be cleaned prior to use. Do not use highly alkaline or highly acidic water to mix sprays. Use a buffering agent if necessary to maintain neutrality (pH 6 to 8) of water in the tank.
  • Maintain agitation during application. Apply immediately after mixing; do not allow spray mix to stand overnight. Always jar test before mixing products to avoid chemical incompatibility.

Note:This Sucking Pest Control should only be used on the recommended dose. Overdose is a violation of law, and it will not give you a better result. Apply immediately when the solution is mixed. Avoid the spray mixture to stand overnight.

fields.Description:
Product Description

  • Tagmycin is a broad-spectrum chemical bactericide that contains a combination of Streptomycin Sulphate + Tetracycline Hydrochloride 90:10 SP.
  • It is recommended for selective control of bacterial disease in plants. Tagmycin is very effective when applied after the crop is infected and hence has good curative action against bacterial infection in plants.

Technical Content

  • Streptomycin Sulphate + Tetracycline Hydrochloride 90:10 SP.

Features & Benefits

FEATURES

  • Powerful Bactericide: Tagmycin combines Streptomycin Sulphate and Tetracycline Hydrochloride in a 90:10 ratio, providing a potent bactericidal effect against a wide range of bacterial infections in crops.
  • Broad-Spectrum Application: While the description mistakenly references Metsulfuron Methyl's action on weeds, Tagmycin is specifically designed to combat bacterial diseases, offering broad-spectrum protection for a variety of crops.

Usage

CROPS

  • Rice, Wheat, Apple, Cotton, Pulses, Cauliflower, Oilseeds.


INSECTS/ DISEASE

  • Bacterial leaf blight of rice, Bacterial leaf spot, Angular leaf spot, Stem canker


DOSAGE

  • 6-12 gm in 60 L water

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Geomycin is a broad-spectrum organic bactericide.
  • It protects plants from bacterial diseases and increases resistance against them.
  • It gives healthy growth and more resistance to plants.

Geolife Geomycin Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Consortium of plant extracts.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Geomycin improves the immune system of the plant & protects the plant from bacterial diseases and increases resistance against them.
  • In combination with any other fungicide, it gives complete protection to plants from bacterial and fungal diseases.
  • Geolife Geomycin gives healthy growth with a greener appearance.

Geomycin Usage & Crops

  • Recommended Crops: All crops (vegetable, fruits, pulses, cereals)
  • Targeted Disease: Cotton Blight, Cucumber Bacterial wilt, Rice Leaf Blight, Cranker of Citrus, Tomato Bacterial Wilt and Chili Leaf Spot
  • Dosage: 0.5 ΓÇô 1 gm/ L of water
  • Method of Application: Foliar application. Preventive application at 15-20 days interval and curative application at disease initiation stage every 10-15 days of interval.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purpose only. Always follow to the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Saaf Fungicide is one among the most trusted fungicide in India.
  • Saaf technical name - Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% WP
  • It is a proven & classic fungicide with systemic & contact action.
  • It ensures complete protection of the crop from fungal infections.
  • UPL Saaf has long-lasting efficacy against a wide range of crops and diseases.

Saaf Fungicide Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% WP
  • Mode of Entry: Both Systemic & Contact
  • Mode of Action: Saaf Fungicide, contains carbendazim and mancozeb, works as a dual mode of action against fungi. Carbendazim acts systemically, spreads throughout the plant tissues and targets the fungal cells ability to multiply. Mancozeb works by contact action and creates a barrier on the plant surface and stops the fungal spores from infecting the plant.

Key Features and Benefits

  • Broad Spectrum and effective across a wide range of crops and diseases
  • Saaf Fungicide is effective against all stages of fungal infection.
  • Safe and easy to use and can be applied as a preventive or curative measure.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Indofil M45 Fungicide is a Broad-Spectrum Fungicide effectively controls a wide range of diseases.
  • M45 technical name - Mancozeb 75% WP
  • It acts as a protective fungicide.
  • Indofil M45 is a quick acting fungicide which quickly controls the disease.

Indofil M45 Fungicide Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Mancozeb 75% WP
  • Mode of Entry: Contact fungicide
  • Mode of Action: Indofil M45 is a broad-spectrum fungicide with protective action. The product is fungi toxic when exposed to air. It is converted to an isothiocyanate, which inactivates the sulphahydral (SH) groups in enzymes of fungi. Sometimes the metals are exchanged between mancozeb and enzymes of fungi, thus causing disturbance in fungal enzyme functioning.

Key Features and Benefits

  • King of all fungicides- Broad spectrum fungicide, which controls large no. of diseases with its multisite action, caused by phycomycetous, advance fungi and other group of fungi infecting many crops.
  • Wide spectrum of use- Used for foliar sprays, nursery drenching and seed treatments.
  • Provides Nutrition- In addition to disease control, it provides manganese and zinc to crop, there by correcting the deficiency of these micronutrient.
  • Wide spectrum of use- Used for foliar sprays, nursery drenching and seed treatments.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Roundup Herbicide is the most successful and widely used product of Bayer agrochemicals.
  • Roundup Herbicide technical name - Glyphosate 41% SL
  • It is a non-selective herbicide, which will provide effective weed control.
  • It is fast acting weed - killer.
  • It is also suitable in non-cropped areas for effective control of weeds in industrial sites, road sites, orchards, bunds, and borders of a field, etc.

Bayer Roundup Herbicide Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Glyphosate 41% SL
  • Mode of Entry: Systemic herbicide
  • Mode of Action: It is a post-emergent herbicide, it kills plants after they have emerged from the soil. It is a non-selective herbicide, which means it can kill most plants, regardless of their type or species. It contains glyphosate, which inhibits an enzyme called EPSP synthase in plants. This enzyme is essential for the synthesis of aromatic amino acids, which are needed for various plant functions. By blocking this enzyme, Roundup disrupts the plantΓÇÖs metabolism and causes gradual death.

Key Features and Benefits

  • It is broad spectrum and non-selective herbicide.
  • Roundup Herbicide is effective on annual and perennial weeds.
  • It eliminates both broad leaved weeds & grasses.
  • Quick rain fastness: Within 2 hours of application, Roundup can withstand rain.

Roundup Herbicide (Glyphosate 41% SL) Usage and Crops

Recommended Crops:

Method of Application:Ground level spray on young newly emerged weeds

Additional Information

  • For paddy pre-plant application, the product is to be applied before planting paddy crop (at least 3 days before) when weeds have emerged in the field. This product should not be applied in standing paddy crop at any cost.
  • Roundup herbicide cannot be shipped to Kerala, Punjab, Telangana, And Andhra Pradesh.
  • COD not available for 20 liters bottle for all states.

Disclaimer:This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Glycel Herbicide is a systemic, broad spectrum, non-selective post emergent herbicide.
  • It is effective in controlling all weeds including annuals, perennials, grassy, broadleaf weeds and sedges.
  • Symitomo Glycel is a fast-acting herbicide that provides visible results within a few hours of application.

Glycel Herbicide Technical Details

  • Technical Name: Glyphosate 41% SL
  • Mode of Entry: Systemic
  • Mode of Action: Glycel is a systemic herbicide and contains Glyphosate 41%. It is absorbed by the leaves and transported throughout the plant, including the roots. It works by inhibiting an enzyme called EPSP synthase, which is involved in the synthesis of amino acids. As a result, the plant cannot produce essential proteins and stops growing, eventually leading to death.

Key Features and Benefits

  • Most widely used herbicide and has become an integral part of modern farming.
  • Widely used in non-crop areas, bunds, and water channels.
  • Glycel Herbicide is also used in tea plantation to control various weeds.

Glycel Herbicide (Glyphosate 41% SL) Usage and Crops

  • Recommended crops: Tea, Non cropped areas
  • Target Weeds: Arundinella bengalensis, Axonopus compressus, Cynodon dactylon, Imperata cylindrical, Kalm grass, Paspalum scrobiculatum, Polygonum perfoliatum, Soghum helepense , and other dicot & monocot weeds in general.
  • Dosage: 10-15 ml / lit. of water
  • Method of Application: Foliar Application

Additional Information

  • Glycel Herbicide cannot be shipped to Kerala, Punjab, and Andhra Pradesh Telangana.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Balanstick is silicon-based Organic Sticker, non-ionic, highly concentrated surfactant with great ability to spread and penetrate at rapid speed and vigour apart from balancing pH, which enables the spray to Rain fastener.
  • This silicon-based spreader sticker of the new era is known as the Superspreader sticker enhances the efficiency of herbicides, fungicides, insecticides, plant growth regulators, and micronutrient fertilizers.

Balanstick Technical Details

  • Technical Content: Silicone Sticker Spreader for Agriculture Use

Key Features & Benefits

  • Super Spreader Sticker: Balanstick increases the spreading ability of an agrochemical manifold to cover most of the plant surfaces.
  • Penetrator: It has great penetration ability which assists the agrochemicals to get absorbed fast on all sprayed surfaces.
  • Activator: It accelerates the activity of the agrochemical tremendously to render the best results.
  • Rain fastness: It does not wash away even if it rains soon after the application.
  • It is non-corrosive to spray equipment and prevents nozzle clogging.

Kay-Bee Balanstick Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: All Crops

Dosage & Method application

  • Sticker for Fungicide / Insecticide 0.4 ΓÇô 0.5 ml/lit
  • Herbicide 0.7 ΓÇô 0.8 ml/lit
  • Plant Regulator 0.4 ΓÇô 0.5 ml/ lit
  • Fertilizers and Micronutrients 0.3 ΓÇô 1.5 ml/lit

Additional Information

  • Balanstick is non-compatible with sulphur, copper-based fungicides, and Bordeaux mixture.
  • The best times for the application of Balanstick are morning and evening. Avoid application during noon time when the temperature is high.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

Organic Snake Repellent is a natural extract repellant crystalline in form with aromatic odour and slight brown in colour.

It should be applied along the walls of the warehouse, fencing of the premises, and walls of the buildings.

Dr SuiBio Organic Snake Repellent Technical Details

Technical Content: Organic snake repellent powder

Mode of Action: The repellent works by emitting a scent that is unpleasant to snakes, deterring them from entering the treated area.

Key Features & Benefits

It is Eco-friendly

Organic Snake Repellent is long-lasting

It is easy to use

Organic Snake Repellent Usage & Crops

Recommended Crops: All Crops

Targeted Pest: Snake

Application: Dr Snake repellant crystals is to be distributed evenly at the rate of 7 running meters per kilo along the fence, walls & borders of the infected location.

Additional Information

Store Organic Snake Repellent at room temperature.

Dispose of the pouches as per local regulations.

Always use gloves and goggles while applying.

Keep away from children, food, animal feeds etc. Keep in cool place.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.cardtitle: SUN BIO COMPACT (BIO FERTILIZER DECOMPOSING CULTURE)
fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Sun Bio Compact is a consortium of aerobic microorganisms specially developed for composting or degrading organic wastes like press mud, spent wash, cow dung, poultry manure, coir pith, sugarcane trash, bagasse, city garbage and other agricultural wastes.
  • This ecofriendly microbial compost starter culture helps to accelerate the organic matter decomposition with increased humification and shortened composting time.
  • It is harmless to human beings, animals, birds and plants and is fully biodegradable.

Sun Bio Compact Biofertilizer Technical Details

  • Technical Name: Decomposing Culture (CFU: Rhizobium or Azotobacter or Azospirillum: 1 X 108 per ml PSB: 1 X 108 per ml KSB: 1 X 108 per ml)
  • Mode of Action: Composting is a process of decomposition of organic matter by a mixed population of microorganisms under warm, aerobic and moist conditions. During the composting process, the basic elements in the organic matter such as carbohydrates, proteins, fat, cellulose and others, get degraded by microorganisms to give a stable compound known as humus, which is excellent organic manure. While normal composting takes 4 to 5 Months, by using Sun Bio Compact, the composting is accelerated, and decomposing is achieved within 2 months.

Key Features and Benefits

  • Sun Bio Compact Decomposing Culture accelerates the decomposition process to reach a more balanced C: N ratio within 6 - 8 weeks.
  • It accelerates and sustains temperature rise in compost heaps from 60-70┬░ C.
  • Pathogens, pests and weed seeds are totally eliminated by this high temperature decomposition.
  • It produces growth stimulants that are required for plant growth.
  • It minimizes odour nuisances and helps in maintaining hygienic conditions in farms, compost yards, waste collection sites and garbage dumping yards.

Sun Bio Compact Decomposing Culture Usage and Crops

  • Recommended Crops: The decomposed material can be used for all types of crops.
  • Dosage & Method of Application: Fertigation (Per Acre): Mix 1-2 liter of Sun Bio Compact T in water and apply in the root zone through drip system. Helpful in decomposing organic matter in soil.
  • Procedure for use: Moisten 1 ton of organic matter with water and keep it overnight. Make windrows or heaps of 1 meter height of organic matter in shade. Mix 1 liter of Sun Bio Compact Biofertilizer Decomposing Culture in 50-100 liters of water and spray this mixture on organic matter. If required, sprinkle water copiously and cover the heap with perforated poly sheet or gunny cloth. The heap should be moistened periodically to compensate evaporation losses. The entire heap should be left undisturbed till it matures. When the pile becomes cool and reduces to about 25% of its original size, it is ready for use.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Speed Kompost is an organic manure enriched with microbes offered by Kan Biosys.
  • It is an essential input for efficient recycling stable compost.
  • It has unique 4R action accelerates the decomposition of organic waste to useful compost.
  • It helps in maintaining soil fertility.

Speed Kompost Technical Details & Composition

  • Composition: Organic manure formulation enriched with cellulolytic microbes like Bacillus polymyxa, Azotobacter, Trichoderma viride, Chaetomium globosum, Trichoderma lignorum. Cellulolytic, amylolytic, proteolytic enzyme secreting Aspergillus, Penicillium, Chaetomium, Trichoderma, Paecilomyces, Streptomyces etc as dynamic formulation.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Speed Kompost is non-toxic and residue-free.
  • It has an important role in soil health management and improves soil carbon.
  • It improves fertilizer and water use efficiency.
  • It helps in yield increases by 5-12%.

Speed Kompost Usage & Crops

  • Recommended Crops: All Crops
  • Dosage: 4 Kg/Acre
  • Method of Application: Soil application

Additional Information

  • Speed Kompost can be used alongside fertilizers. In fact, it is often recommended to use it with a bag of urea per acre to enhance the decomposition process.
  • It can be used with other organic soil amendments to improve soil health and fertility.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.cardtitle: Tapas Eco Sticky Trap - A5 Size
fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Yellow sticky traps are a common method for monitoring many insects, but it has not been shown whether they could be used as a control method. Blue color dark and depth in nature. Because of this harmful insect pest like thrips, attracts towards blue colour. This increases the specificity of the traps and avoids the complications of attracting non target and in particular beneficial insects, which need to be preserved. It controls sucking pest like Whitefly, Aphid, Jassids, Leafhoppers, Brown Plant hopper, Thrips, Leaf miner Adult, Tea Mesquites Bugs. Combination of yellow and blue sheets gives best prevention from all this plant sap sucking pest.

Features & Benefits

Features

  • Highly Effective
  • Harmful insect can attract from long distance
  • Ready to use
  • Reduce pesticide usage

Benefits

  • High adhesive layer.
  • Ideal for quick and simple monitoring.
  • Nontoxic glue, does not dry fast.
  • Easy to install in the field.
  • User friendly.

Usage

Target pest

  • Yellow Colour:- Whitefly, Aphid, Leafhoppers, Brown Plant hopper,Fruit Fly and other Flying Insects
  • Blue Colour:- Thrips, Leaf miner Adult, Tea Mesquites Bugs, Cabbage root Fly, Onion fly and Other Flying Insects.
  • Crops- Vegetable and Flowers
  • Per acre- 1 Pack/acre required.

fields.cardtitle: Tapas Blue Sticky Trap 11 Cm X 28 Cm
fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • The Blue Sticky Trap has important advantages in pest management. Blue color dark and depth in nature. Because of this harmful insect pest like thrips, leaf miner fly attracts towards blue colour. This increases the specificity of the traps and avoids the complications of attracting non target and in particular beneficial insects, which need to be preserved. The blue traps can comfortably be used in greenhouses etc. where beneficial insects are being released. Sometimes beneficial insect can trap randomly. These are standard cut sized paper sheets coated both the sides with insect sticky adhesive along with release paper.

Technical Content

  • It uses bright blue color which attracts the insects towards itself once it gets closer it gets stuck to the gum on the surface of the paper.

Features & Benefits

Features

  • Highly Effective
  • Harmful insect can attract from long distance
  • Ready to use
  • Reduce pesticide usage

Benefits

  • High adhesive layer.
  • Ideal for quick and simple monitoring.
  • Nontoxic glue, does not dry fast.
  • Easy to install in the field.
  • User friendly.

Usage

Crops

  • Vegetable and Flowers

Pests

  • Thrips, Leaf miner, Tea mosquito bug, Cucumber beetles, Cabbage root fly and other flying Insects.

Mode Of Action

  • Simply hang above your crop at regular intervals and count insect catch regularly to determine population size and source of problem.
  • Glue traps are designed to make a real impact in your greenhouse.
  • Monitors and detects the insects in the field.
  • Attracts all flying insects which damage the crops.

Dosage

  • Blue sticky trap 15 to 25/acre required.
fields.Description_of_product:
Product Description

About Product

  • The Blue Sticky Trap has important advantages in pest management. Blue color dark and depth in nature. Because of this harmful insect pest like thrips, leaf miner fly attracts towards blue colour. This increases the specificity of the traps and avoids the complications of attracting non target and in particular beneficial insects, which need to be preserved. The blue traps can comfortably be used in greenhouses etc. where beneficial insects are being released. Sometimes beneficial insect can trap randomly. These are standard cut sized paper sheets coated both the sides with insect sticky adhesive along with release paper.

Technical Content

  • It uses bright blue color which attracts the insects towards itself once it gets closer it gets stuck to the gum on the surface of the paper.

Features & Benefits

Features

  • Highly Effective
  • Harmful insect can attract from long distance
  • Ready to use
  • Reduce pesticide usage

Benefits

  • High adhesive layer.
  • Ideal for quick and simple monitoring.
  • Nontoxic glue, does not dry fast.
  • Easy to install in the field.
  • User friendly.

Usage

Crops

  • Vegetable and Flowers

Pests

  • Thrips, Leaf miner, Tea mosquito bug, Cucumber beetles, Cabbage root fly and other flying Insects.

Mode Of Action

  • Simply hang above your crop at regular intervals and count insect catch regularly to determine population size and source of problem.
  • Glue traps are designed to make a real impact in your greenhouse.
  • Monitors and detects the insects in the field.
  • Attracts all flying insects which damage the crops.

Dosage

  • Blue sticky trap 15 to 25/acre required.

fields.cardtitle: VGT SOLAR INSECT LIGHT TRAP WITH SINGLE STAND
fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Solar Insect Light Trap with Single Stand is made with an Intention to help Farmers. Solar Insect Trap Attracts Almost All the Flying Insects (Pest) on All Types of Crops which have the problem of Pests.
  • Therefore, Farmers will Save Huge Money which They Spent on Pesticides. Also, Our Solar Trap is Fully Automatic, which when Installed Works Automatically.
  • As Solar Trap works on Solar Energy it is an Organic Product.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Solar panel power - 4 w
  • Voltage - 9.95 v
  • Ampere - 0.419 A
  • Open circuit volt -11.5 V
  • Brand: Made in India
  • Solar Panel -195X235mm (Dimensions) U
  • No of led - 12 U V Led (395-400nm) wavelength.
  • Battery - Lead-Acid
  • Battery Voltage - 4V 2AH
  • Charging - By Solar Panel & Adaptor (QV)
  • On/Off ΓÇô Automatic
  • Battery Backup ΓÇô 12 HRS
  • Solar Insect Light Trap with Single Stand is a device for pest control. The device gets charged in daytime using sunlight and automatically switches on at dawn and dusk to trap harmful insects.

Solar Insect Light Trap with Single Stand Usage & Crops

  • Recommended Crops: All
  • Targeted Pest: Flying Insect
  • Dosage: 1 per Acre

Additional Information

  • Weight: 5KG

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.

fields.Description:
Product Description

About Product

  • Mini Solar Insect Light Trap is a device for pest control. The device gets charged in day time using sunlight and automatically switches on at dawn and dusk to trap harmful insects.
  • First Time In India With Yellow & Blue Combination Ultra Violet Light.

Key Features & Benefits

  • For controlling All types of sucking pest and the flying moths in every crop at various stage.
  • Lure handle is also available so specific pest lure is also available to attach.
  • 3-watt solar panel
  • 2000 mh lithium ion battery
  • 4 hr working, automatic switch-on after sunset
  • Tray for pest collection
  • UV Led lights
  • Lure Handle for attaching lure of specific pest
  • Machine Specifications
  • Net weight: 450 gm including tray.
  • Colour-Yellow
  • Material-Mixed Materials.

Wavar Mini Solar Insect Light Trap Usage & Crops

  • Crops: All types Fruits, Vegetable and Flowers
  • Targeted Insects: White fly, Jassids, Aphids, Thrips, Tuta Absoluta, Brinjal Shoot and fruit borer, Fall Armyworm, Helicoverpa Armigera, Pink Bollworm, Rice yellow stem borer and other flying Insects.
  • Dosage: 1-2 Traps/acre.
  • Warranty: 6 months on battery.

Disclaimer: This information is provided for reference purposes only. Always follow the recommended application guidelines outlined on the product label and accompanying leaflet.
